books.summary: Noodle Head is a mischievous character who always finds himself in funny and outlandish situations due to his silly antics. Despite his quirks, Noodle Head learns valuable lessons through his adventures.

books.title: Holiday House: The True Story of Their Adventures
books.summary: Holiday House is a magical place where children can have fantastical adventures with talking animals and mythical creatures. Join the children as they explore the wonders of Holiday House and learn important life lessons along the way.

books.title: Whingdingdilly
books.summary: Whingdingdilly is a whimsical tale about a king who becomes bored of his royal life and seeks excitement in the land of Whingdingdilly. Along the way, he learns the true value of happiness and contentment.

books.title: The Story of Ferdinand
books.summary: Ferdinand is a peaceful bull who does not conform to the aggressive nature of bulls. Despite being misunderstood, Ferdinand remains true to himself and teaches others the importance of individuality and nonviolence.

books.title: Because of Winn-Dixie
books.summary: Because of Winn-Dixie tells the story of a young girl named Opal who finds a scruffy dog in a supermarket and names him Winn-Dixie. Through her friendship with Winn-Dixie, Opal meets the quirky residents of her new town and learns about love, friendship, and forgiveness.

books.title: The Tale of Despereaux
books.summary: The Tale of Despereaux follows the adventures of a tiny mouse with big ears named Despereaux who sets out on a quest to rescue a princess in a magical kingdom. Along the way, he encounters rats, a kind-hearted serving girl, and learns about bravery and forgiveness.

books.title: Flora & Ulysses: The Illuminated Adventures
books.summary: Flora & Ulysses follows the story of Flora, a young comic book fan, and Ulysses, a super-powered squirrel. Together, they embark on a series of quirky and hilarious adventures as they navigate friendship, family, and the power of imagination.

books.title: The Miraculous Journey of Edward Tulane
books.summary: The Miraculous Journey of Edward Tulane follows the journey of a china rabbit named Edward who is separated from his owner and embarks on an extraordinary adventure. Along the way, Edward learns about love, loss, and the true meaning of belonging.

books.title: Raymie Nightingale
books.summary: Raymie Nightingale tells the story of three girls who enter a local beauty pageant in the hopes of gaining attention from their absent parents. As they navigate friendship, loss, and growing up, Raymie discovers the importance of finding her own voice.

books.title: Louisiana's Way Home
books.summary: Louisiana's Way Home follows the journey of Louisiana Elefante as she is unexpectedly uprooted from her home and forced to confront her past. Through her adventures, Louisiana learns about family, forgiveness, and the power of resilience.

books.title: Mercy Watson to the Rescue
books.summary: Mercy Watson to the Rescue introduces readers to Mercy, a lovable pig who causes chaos wherever she goes. In this humorous series, Mercy's antics lead to hilarious escapades as she navigates the challenges of everyday life with her human family.

books.title: Bink & Gollie
books.summary: Bink & Gollie follows the adventures of two best friends, Bink and Gollie, as they navigate the ups and downs of friendship with humor and heart. Through their escapades, Bink and Gollie learn about compromise, individuality, and the joy of true friendship.

books.title: La La La: A Story of Hope
books.summary: La La La: A Story of Hope is a beautifully illustrated picture book about a young girl who sings alone in the hopes of finding a friend. Through the power of music and perseverance, the girl discovers that friendship and connection can be found in unexpected places.

books.title: Good Rosie!
books.summary: Good Rosie! follows the story of a dog named Rosie who learns to navigate the challenges of making friends at the dog park. Through humor and heartwarming illustrations, Rosie discovers the importance of being herself and embracing the friendships that come her way.

books.title: Babe: The Gallant Pig
books.summary: Babe, a clever pig, is raised by a border collie and learns the skills of a sheepdog. Despite the doubts of the farmer and other animals, Babe proves that he has what it takes to be a champion. A heartwarming tale of friendship and perseverance.

books.title: The Sheep-Pig
books.summary: When a piglet named Piggy is taken in by a farmer, he finds himself in the midst of sheepdog trials. Despite being a pig, Piggy shows intelligence and determination that surprises everyone. A delightful story of acceptance and dreaming big.

books.title: The Water Horse
books.summary: While fishing by a loch, a young boy named Angus discovers a mysterious egg that hatches into a sea creature known as the Water Horse. As the Water Horse grows, Angus faces the challenges of keeping the creature hidden and safe. A magical adventure filled with wonder and friendship.

books.title: The Fox Busters
books.summary: Three clever hens, called the Fox Busters, set out to outwit the cunning foxes who have been causing trouble on the farm. With their wit and resourcefulness, the hens come up with inventive ways to foil the foxes' plans. A humorous and entertaining story of bravery and teamwork.

books.title: Lady Lollipop
books.summary: Princess Penelope is delighted when she receives a pig as a birthday present, but the palace staff are less enthusiastic about caring for a pig. Lady Lollipop, the pig, soon wins everyone over with her charming personality and helps the princess in unexpected ways. A funny and heartwarming tale of friendship and loyalty.

books.title: The Queen's Nose
books.summary: When Harmony Parker discovers an old 50p coin that grants wishes when rubbed, she embarks on a series of adventures trying to make the world a better place. But each wish comes with unexpected consequences, teaching Harmony important lessons about responsibility and the power of kindness.

books.title: Harry's Mad
books.summary: Harry's family adopts a parrot named Madam Rosa, who turns out to be not just any parrot, but one with extraordinary abilities and a mischievous streak. As Madam Rosa causes chaos and hilarity in Harry's life, he discovers the true meaning of family and the joy of embracing the unexpected.

books.title: The Hodgeheg
books.summary: Max, a hedgehog with dreams of crossing the road to reach the park's tasty treats, embarks on a dangerous journey to navigate the perils of cars and roads. Along the way, Max learns important lessons about courage, determination, and the power of perseverance. A charming and adventurous tale.

books.title: Martin's Mice
books.summary: Martin, a young cat who has never caught a mouse, sets out to prove his hunting skills when he discovers a family of mice living in the garden shed. However, Martin soon realizes that the mice are not like any other mice he's encountered, leading to a surprising and heartwarming friendship. A delightful and humorous story of unlikely friendships.

books.title: The Invisible Dog
books.summary: When friends Ellie and Luke stumble upon a stray dog that turns out to be invisible, they embark on a series of adventures trying to keep the invisible dog safe and find a way to make him visible again. Along the way, they learn valuable lessons about empathy, friendship, and the importance of helping those in need.

books.title: Stargirl
books.summary: Stargirl tells the story of a homeschooled girl named Stargirl Caraway who enrolls in a public high school and stands out for her unique and quirky personality. Through her journey, she teaches her classmates about embracing individuality and the importance of kindness.

books.title: Maniac Magee
books.summary: Maniac Magee follows the story of Jeffrey Lionel Magee, an orphan boy with extraordinary athletic abilities who becomes a legend in his town for his daring and altruistic deeds. The book explores themes of race, prejudice, and the power of community.

books.title: Wringer
books.summary: Wringer is a compelling tale about a boy named Palmer LaRue who is forced to participate in a cruel tradition of wringing the necks of pigeons. As Palmer grapples with his moral dilemma, he must navigate the pressures of peer acceptance and standing up for what he believes in.

books.title: Loser
books.summary: Loser follows the story of Donald Zinkoff, a kind-hearted and enthusiastic boy who faces ridicule from his peers due to his eccentricities. Despite the challenges he encounters, Donald's resilience and optimism shine through as he discovers the true meaning of success.

books.title: Smiles to Go
books.summary: Smiles to Go centers on the life of 12-year-old Will Tuppence, a science lover who grapples with friendship dynamics, family relationships, and the concept of time. As Will navigates the complexities of growing up, he learns valuable lessons about change and acceptance.

books.title: Milkweed
books.summary: Milkweed is a poignant novel set during the Holocaust, following the journey of a young boy known as Misha who becomes embroiled in the harsh realities of Nazi-occupied Warsaw. Through Misha's eyes, readers witness the atrocities of war and the enduring power of hope.

books.title: The Library Card
books.summary: The Library Card unfolds the interconnected stories of four young individuals from different backgrounds who find solace and inspiration through the power of reading. Spanning various time periods and genres, the book celebrates the transformative impact of books on people's lives.

books.title: Eggs
books.summary: Eggs follows the unlikely friendship between two boys, David and Primrose, who form a bond while dealing with their personal struggles and familial issues. Through their heartwarming and humorous interactions, David and Primrose find healing and companionship in one another.

books.title: Love, Stargirl
books.summary: Love, Stargirl serves as a companion novel to Stargirl, continuing the story through Stargirl's unique voice as she embarks on a new adventure in a new town. The book explores themes of love, loss, and the enduring power of self-expression.

books.title: Crash
books.summary: Crash follows the transformation of a boy named John 'Crash' Coogan from a competitive and self-centered athlete to a more compassionate and understanding individual. As Crash navigates friendships and family dynamics, he learns valuable lessons about empathy and personal growth.

books.title: The Snowy Day
books.summary: The Snowy Day follows a young boy named Peter as he explores his neighborhood covered in snow. Through Peter's adventures, the book highlights the joy of playing in the snow and the beauty of winter.

books.title: Whistle for Willie
books.summary: Whistle for Willie is a heartwarming story about Peter's determination to learn how to whistle for his dog, Willie. The book captures the bond between a boy and his pet, and the triumph of achieving a new skill.

books.title: Peter's Chair
books.summary: Peter's Chair tells the story of Peter, who struggles to accept his new baby sister and the changes in his family. Through his creative solution of decorating his old chair for his sister, Peter finds a way to adapt and embrace the changes.

books.title: A Letter to Amy
books.summary: A Letter to Amy follows Peter as he writes a special invitation to his friend Amy for his birthday party. The book explores themes of friendship, communication, and the anticipation of a celebration.

books.title: Goggles!
books.summary: Goggles! tells the story of two boys, Peter and Archie, who find a pair of motorcycle goggles and embark on imaginative adventures together. The book celebrates friendship and the power of imagination.

books.title: Dreams
books.summary: Dreams is a collection of short stories and poems that depict children's dreams and aspirations. Each story celebrates the creativity and imagination of children.

books.title: Louie
books.summary: Louie follows the adventures of a little boy named Louie who discovers a painting and imagines himself inside the artwork. The book celebrates the power of art and a child's boundless imagination.

books.title: Jennie's Hat
books.summary: Jennie's Hat is a charming story about a little girl named Jennie who dreams of a beautiful hat she sees in the store. Jennie's determination and resourcefulness lead her to create her own unique hat.

books.title: Whose Mouse Are You?
books.summary: Whose Mouse Are You? follows a little mouse named Willy who sets out to find his own identity and purpose. Through Willy's quest, the book explores themes of self-discovery and independence.

books.title: Pet Show!
books.summary: Pet Show! tells the story of Archie, who enters his cat into the neighborhood pet show. The book follows the humorous events that unfold during the pet show and highlights the special bond between pets and their owners.

books.title: Redwall
books.summary: Redwall Abbey, a peaceful home to a community of mice, is threatened by the evil rat Cluny the Scourge. Matthias, a young mouse who dreams of becoming a great warrior, must lead the defense of Redwall against Cluny's forces in an epic battle of good versus evil.

books.title: Mossflower
books.summary: Before the establishment of Redwall Abbey, the mouse Martin becomes a legendary hero in Mossflower Woods as he battles the tyrant wildcat Verdauga Greeneyes and his army of vermin. Along the way, Martin helps establish peace and justice in the land.

books.title: Mattimeo
books.summary: Mattimeo, the son of Matthias, is kidnapped by Slagar the Cruel, a fox slaver. Matthias and a group of Redwallers embark on a perilous journey to rescue Mattimeo and other young captives, facing numerous challenges and dangers along the way.

books.title: Mariel of Redwall
books.summary: Mariel, a young mousemaid with a mysterious past, washes ashore near Redwall Abbey and seeks vengeance against the cruel searat Gabool the Wild. With the help of friends and allies, Mariel sets out on an adventure to confront Gabool and uncover her true identity.

books.title: The Bellmaker
books.summary: Joseph the Bellmaker and his companions journey to Southsward to rescue their kidnapped friends from the tyrannical fox Urgan Nagru. Along the way, they face treacherous enemies, make new allies, and embark on a quest to restore peace to the land.

books.title: Salamandastron
books.summary: Urthstripe the Strong, Badger Lord of Salamandastron, defends his mountain stronghold against the siege of the wicked warlord Ferahgo the Assassin. With the help of allies and brave warriors, Urthstripe faces a fierce battle to protect Salamandastron and its inhabitants.

books.title: Martin the Warrior
books.summary: The legendary mouse hero Martin embarks on a quest for vengeance against the corsair stoat Badrang the Tyrant, who enslaved Martin and his friends. Along the way, Martin overcomes hardship, makes new friends, and prepares for a final showdown with his nemesis.

books.title: Pearls of Lutra
books.summary: A mysterious riddle leads a group of Redwallers to the forgotten island of Sampetra, where they uncover the lost treasure of the otter queen Lutra. As they navigate treacherous waters and face dangerous foes, the quest for the Pearls of Lutra becomes a thrilling adventure.

books.title: Taggerung
books.summary: Taggerung, a young otter with exceptional skills in combat, is caught between his peaceful upbringing at Redwall Abbey and his violent past as a member of the Juska tribe. As Taggerung struggles with his identity, he must confront his destiny and face his enemies in a battle for survival.

books.title: Triss
books.summary: Triss, a courageous squirrelmaid with a fiery spirit, seeks to rescue her friends from the evil ferret King Agarnu and his slave drivers. Alongside her companions, Triss embarks on a dangerous journey to reclaim her homeland, face her enemies, and restore justice to the land.

books.title: Sweet Valley High: Double Love
books.summary: In the first book of the iconic Sweet Valley High series, twins Jessica and Elizabeth Wakefield find themselves vying for the affections of the same boy, leading to jealousy, rivalry, and revelations about their own identities.

books.title: Fearless
books.summary: The Fearless series follows protagonist Gaia Moore, a genetically engineered teenage girl with enhanced physical abilities, as she navigates a world filled with danger and intrigue while uncovering the truth about her origins.

books.title: The Ruling Class
books.summary: In a prestigious private school where privilege and power reign, three students from different backgrounds form an unlikely alliance to challenge the status quo and expose the dark secrets of the ruling class.

books.title: Hangin' Out With Cici
books.summary: A hilarious and heartwarming tale of friendship, adventure, and self-discovery set in the fast-paced world of high school, where protagonist Cici and her eccentric group of friends navigate the ups and downs of teenage life.

books.title: Fearless: Twisted
books.summary: In the sequel to the Fearless series, Gaia Moore faces a new set of challenges as she unravels a twisted mystery involving a powerful secret society and a dangerous conspiracy that threatens her very existence.

books.title: The Sweet Life
books.summary: A spin-off series from Sweet Valley High, The Sweet Life follows the adult lives of twins Jessica and Elizabeth Wakefield as they navigate the complexities of love, career, and family in the glamorous world of California.

books.title: My First Love and Other Disasters
books.summary: A charming coming-of-age story about first love, heartbreak, and friendship, as protagonist Sarah navigates the ups and downs of teenage romance while learning valuable lessons about love and life.

books.title: Hangin' Out With Cici: Birthday Season
books.summary: In this delightful sequel to Hangin' Out With Cici, protagonist Cici celebrates her birthday with her friends in a series of hilarious misadventures, unexpected surprises, and heartwarming moments of friendship.

books.title: Fearless: Shattered
books.summary: The Fearless series continues as Gaia Moore is plunged into a world of danger and betrayal when a dark secret from her past resurfaces, forcing her to confront her fears and fight for her life against powerful enemies.

books.title: Sweet Valley Confidential: Ten Years Later
books.summary: In this special installment of the Sweet Valley High series, readers catch up with the iconic Wakefield twins ten years after graduation, as they navigate adulthood, relationships, and the lingering secrets of their past.

books.title: Everyone Poops
books.summary: A humorous and educational book that celebrates the universal nature of pooping, reassuring children that it's a normal bodily function for everyone.

books.title: Spring Is Here
books.summary: Follow along as different animals awaken to the arrival of spring, showcasing the beauty of nature's changing seasons through vibrant illustrations.

books.title: Bus Stops
books.summary: Embark on a whimsical journey through a variety of bus stops, each depicting a unique and imaginative scene that sparks creativity and exploration.

books.title: My Friends
books.summary: Celebrate the joys of friendship through charming illustrations and heartwarming stories that showcase the fun and adventures shared among friends.

books.title: Scribbles
books.summary: Encourage creativity and self-expression as children embrace the beauty of doodling and scribbling, turning simple marks into works of art.

books.title: The Crocodile and the Dentist
books.summary: Join the amusing escapades of a crocodile with a toothache as he reluctantly visits the dentist, navigating fears and surprises along the way.

books.title: Where's the Fish?
books.summary: Engage young readers in a delightful game of hide-and-seek as they search for the fish hidden behind various interactive flaps, promoting early learning.

books.title: Fuzzy Yellow Ducklings
books.summary: Introduce young readers to the concept of shapes and animals through an interactive exploration of fuzzy ducklings transforming into different objects.

books.title: The Great Day
books.summary: Celebrate the awesomeness of everyday life through the eyes of a child, highlighting the magic found in simple moments and the joy of being alive.

books.title: Everyone Eats
books.summary: Explore the diverse world of food as it gets consumed by various creatures, teaching children about different eating habits in a fascinating and playful manner.

books.title: Don't Let the Pigeon Drive the Bus!
books.summary: In this hilarious and interactive picture book, the reader is asked to refrain from letting the persistent pigeon drive the bus while the bus driver is away. The pigeon tries all sorts of tactics to convince the reader otherwise, leading to laughs and surprises on every page.

books.title: Knuffle Bunny: A Cautionary Tale
books.summary: Trixie, a young girl, goes on a trip to the laundromat with her dad and her beloved Knuffle Bunny. When Knuffle Bunny goes missing, Trixie has to find a way to communicate her distress to her dad in this heartwarming and funny tale about the bond between a child and their special toy.

books.title: Elephant & Piggie: We Are in a Book!
books.summary: Join Elephant and Piggie as they discover they are characters in a book. This meta and amusing story explores friendship, humor, and the joy of reading as Elephant and Piggie interact with the reader in delightful and unexpected ways.

books.title: Nanette's Baguette
books.summary: Follow Nanette on her errand to get a baguette from the bakery in this whimsical rhyming tale filled with wordplay and humor. As Nanette faces temptation and the challenges of carrying a baguette home without eating it, young readers will be charmed by her sweet and funny adventure.

books.title: Goldilocks and the Three Dinosaurs
books.summary: In this fractured fairy tale, the Three Dinosaurs set a trap for a mischievous, hungry little girl named Goldilocks. As the story unfolds with clever twists and humor, young readers will enjoy the dinosaur-filled retelling of the classic Goldilocks tale.

books.title: Leonardo, the Terrible Monster
books.summary: Meet Leonardo, who is not very good at being a monster. Instead of scaring anyone, he decides to find the perfect candidate for scaring. This heartwarming story explores empathy, understanding, and what it truly means to be a friend in a quirky and endearing way.

books.title: The Duckling Gets a Cookie!?
books.summary: When the duckling receives a cookie just by asking nicely, the pigeon is outraged and questions why the duckling gets everything it asks for. This hilarious and relatable story about jealousy, sharing, and unexpected twists will have young readers laughing and empathizing with the characters.

books.title: Time to Say Please!
books.summary: Join the pigeon as he learns the importance of saying 'please' in this humorous and engaging picture book. With comic antics and valuable lessons about manners and politeness, young readers will enjoy the pigeon's misadventures and the joyful illustrations.

books.title: Edwina, the Dinosaur Who Didn't Know She Was Extinct
books.summary: Meet Edwina, a friendly dinosaur who bakes cookies, helps the community, and is beloved by everyone except Reginald Von Hoobie-Doobie. Reginald is determined to prove to everyone that dinosaurs are extinct, but Edwina's kindness and positive spirit may just change his mind in this heartwarming story about acceptance and friendship.

books.title: That Is Not a Good Idea!
books.summary: In this clever and suspenseful tale, a sly fox invites a plump goose to join him for dinner. As the story unfolds with echoes of classic fairy tales, readers will be delighted by the unexpected twists and turns that lead to a hilarious and satisfying conclusion.

books.title: A Single Shard
books.summary: Set in 12th-century Korea, 'A Single Shard' follows the story of a young orphan named Tree-ear who dreams of becoming a potter. Through determination and hard work, Tree-ear embarks on a journey filled with challenges and obstacles as he strives to achieve his goal in an era of artistic excellence.

books.title: The Kite Fighters
books.summary: In ancient Korea, brothers Young-sup and Kee-sup become skilled kite fighters, but only one can fly the kite while the other controls it. Set against the backdrop of the Joseon Dynasty, this story explores themes of competition, family, and friendship as the brothers navigate the world of kite fighting.

books.title: When My Name Was Keoko
books.summary: Told from the perspectives of siblings Sun-hee and Tae-yul during the Japanese occupation of Korea, 'When My Name Was Keoko' depicts their struggles to preserve their identity and culture amidst war and oppression. This poignant tale highlights the resilience and courage of the Korean people during a tumultuous period.

books.title: Project Mulberry
books.summary: Julia and her friend Patrick embark on a project to raise silkworms for the county fair, but face challenges when discussing themes of identity, friendship, and cultural differences. 'Project Mulberry' is a heartwarming tale that explores the complexities of relationships and the importance of embracing diversity.

books.title: Prairie Lotus
books.summary: In this reimagining of 'Little House on the Prairie', a half-Chinese girl named Hanna struggles to find her place in 1880s Dakota Territory. Facing prejudice and discrimination, Hanna's determination to pursue her dreams of education and acceptance reflects the resilience and spirit of a young pioneer.

books.title: The Firekeeper's Son
books.summary: Sanghee, the son of the village firekeeper, must remember and transmit the signal fires along the Korean coast to warn of impending invasions. This thrilling tale showcases Sanghee's bravery, quick thinking, and loyalty as he plays a crucial role in safeguarding his community during a time of war and chaos.

books.title: Keeping Score
books.summary: In 1950s Brooklyn, Maggie discovers her love for baseball and friendship with the local custodian, James. Against the backdrop of the Dodgers' move to Los Angeles, 'Keeping Score' explores themes of loyalty, courage, and the power of resilience through Maggie's journey of self-discovery and acceptance.

books.title: Forest of Wonders (Wing & Claw, Book 1)
books.summary: Raffa, a young apothecary, discovers a hidden talent to animate the plants around him in the magical Forest of Wonders. As he uncovers a dark secret threatening the forest's existence, Raffa must harness his power to protect his home and its inhabitants in this enchanting tale of courage and friendship.

books.title: Seesaw Girl
books.summary: Ji-su, a young girl in Korea's Joseon Dynasty, dreams of leaving her secluded women's quarters to explore the outside world. Disguised as a boy, Ji-su embarks on secret adventures that challenge societal norms and traditions, showcasing her resilience and determination to pursue her desires.

books.title: Yaks Yak: Animal Word Pairs
books.summary: Filled with playful illustrations and engaging wordplay, 'Yaks Yak' introduces young readers to animal pairs and the concept of homonyms in a fun and educational way. This delightful picture book is a whimsical journey through the English language that encourages language exploration and creativity.

books.title: My Father's Dragon
books.summary: My Father's Dragon is a charming children's fantasy book about a young boy named Elmer Elevator who sets off on an adventurous journey to a magical island to rescue a baby dragon. Along the way, Elmer encounters various challenges and makes new friends. With its whimsical storytelling and engaging plot, this book is sure to captivate young readers.

books.title: Elmer and the Dragon
books.summary: Elmer and the Dragon is the sequel to My Father's Dragon, continuing the adventures of Elmer Elevator as he navigates new challenges and encounters a friendly dragon named Boris. Together, Elmer and Boris embark on a journey full of excitement and discovery. This heartwarming story will enchant young readers with its imaginative world and lovable characters.

books.title: The Dragons of Blueland
books.summary: The Dragons of Blueland is the thrilling conclusion to the trilogy that began with My Father's Dragon. In this book, Elmer Elevator must face the challenge of returning Boris the dragon to his homeland, the magical land of Blueland. Along the way, Elmer and Boris encounter new dangers and obstacles that test their courage and friendship. Young readers will be captivated by the exciting adventures and heartwarming moments in this enchanting finale.

books.title: A Wrinkle in Time
books.summary: A classic novel about a young girl named Meg Murry who embarks on a journey through space and time to rescue her father. With the help of her brother Charles Wallace, her friend Calvin, and three mysterious beings, Mrs. Whatsit, Mrs. Which, and Mrs. Who, they battle the forces of darkness to bring her father back home.

books.title: A Wind in the Door
books.summary: In this sequel to A Wrinkle in Time, Meg must help save her brother Charles Wallace from a deadly illness called the Echthroi. She is aided by Proginoskes, a mystical creature, as she travels inside Charles Wallace to battle the evil forces threatening his life and the universe.

books.title: A Swiftly Tilting Planet
books.summary: Charles Wallace is once again in danger, and Meg and Calvin must travel through time to prevent a catastrophic nuclear war. As they journey through different eras, they must unravel a complex web of family history and historical events to change the course of destiny.

books.title: Many Waters
books.summary: In this installment, twins Sandy and Dennys accidentally find themselves in the time of Noah's Ark. As they navigate this strange and dangerous world, they must uncover hidden truths about themselves, their family, and the nature of good and evil.

books.title: An Acceptable Time
books.summary: Meg's daughter Polly travels back in time to the days of the ancient druids, where she becomes entangled in a battle between light and dark forces. As she discovers her own role in this ancient conflict, Polly must make choices that will impact the fate of the world.

books.title: The Arm of the Starfish
books.summary: When marine biologist Adam Eddington gets caught up in a deadly game of espionage and intrigue while working in Portugal, he must navigate a web of secrets and lies to uncover the truth behind a scientific discovery that could change the course of history.

books.title: Dragons in the Waters
books.summary: Thirteen-year-old Simon and his cousin, the gifted young pianist Jane, find themselves on a transatlantic journey aboard a ship with a mysterious cargo and a dangerous secret. As they unravel the mysteries of the past, they must confront the powers of evil threatening their lives.

books.title: A Ring of Endless Light
books.summary: Vicky Austin spends a summer on a small island, where she grapples with deep questions about life, love, and loss. As she forms close bonds with a group of remarkable dolphins, Vicky learns valuable lessons about the interconnectedness of all living beings.

books.title: Meet the Austins
books.summary: The Austin family's peaceful life is disrupted when they take in an orphaned girl named Maggy. As Maggy becomes a part of their family, the Austins must navigate the challenges of blending different personalities and backgrounds while learning the true meaning of love and acceptance.

books.title: Troubling a Star
books.summary: Vicky Austin travels to Antarctica as a volunteer assistant to a famous marine biologist. Amidst the breathtaking beauty of the icy wilderness, Vicky confronts her fears, navigates complicated relationships, and embarks on a journey of self-discovery that will change her life forever.

books.title: The Changeover
books.summary: In 'The Changeover', a teenage girl named Laura Chant must discover her hidden psychic powers to save her little brother from an evil being known as Carmody Braque. As she navigates this dangerous world of magic and darkness, Laura learns the true power of love and belief in oneself.

books.title: The Haunting
books.summary: In 'The Haunting', siblings Barney and Renen Nightingale must solve the mystery of a haunted house in their neighborhood. With the help of a ghost named Marmaduke, the siblings uncover secrets and face their fears to bring peace to the restless spirits.

books.title: Memory
books.summary: In 'Memory', a teenage girl named JC Chant struggles with her identity and family secrets as she discovers her connection to a powerful witch coven. With the help of her friends, JC must embrace her past and use her abilities to defeat a growing darkness threatening her community.

books.title: The Tricksters
books.summary: In 'The Tricksters', siblings Harry and Bunty must unlock the secrets of an ancient family curse that intertwines their lives with a mischievous group of trickster spirits. As reality and fantasy blur, the siblings must confront their fears and desires to break free from the curse's hold.

books.title: The Other Side of Silence
books.summary: In 'The Other Side of Silence', a teenager named Jonny Dart gets drawn into a mysterious and dangerous world beyond the mirror where his reflection takes on a life of its own. Jonny must face his inner demons and fears to uncover the truth behind this dark reflection.

books.title: The Changeover: A Supernatural Romance
books.summary: A special edition of 'The Changeover' that delves deeper into the romantic elements of Laura Chant's journey to save her brother and discover her own powers. This version explores the blossoming love between Laura and Sorenson Carlisle amidst the supernatural events happening around them.

books.title: Alchemy
books.summary: In 'Alchemy', a young girl named Roland discovers a hidden talent for alchemy that leads her on a quest to uncover a powerful ancient artifact. With the help of her friends, Roland must master the secrets of alchemy to prevent the artifact from falling into the wrong hands.

books.title: The Catalogue of the Universe
books.summary: In 'The Catalogue of the Universe', two teenagers named Angela May and Tycho Potter navigate the complexities of love, friendship, and family secrets as they uncover a catalogue that could change the course of their lives forever. Their journey leads to self-discovery and understanding of the universe's mysteries.

books.title: The Pirate Uncle
books.summary: In 'The Pirate Uncle', a young boy named Tom forms an unlikely alliance with his eccentric uncle who claims to be a pirate captain. Together, they embark on a seafaring adventure filled with treasure hunts, mysterious islands, and dangerous encounters with rival pirates.

books.title: Dangerous Spaces
books.summary: In 'Dangerous Spaces', a teenager named Beverley Vanzant must confront her fears and traumas as she navigates a surreal and dangerous landscape created by her own mind. Through her journey, Beverley learns to face her inner demons and find the strength to overcome her past.

books.title: Anne of Green Gables
books.summary: Anne of Green Gables is the charming story of a young orphan girl named Anne Shirley who is mistakenly sent to live with a brother and sister, Marilla and Matthew Cuthbert, at Green Gables. Anne's vivid imagination and sunny personality bring joy and laughter to the quiet town of Avonlea, as she navigates growing up, making friends, and finding her place in the world.

books.title: Anne of Avonlea
books.summary: Anne of Avonlea follows Anne Shirley as she takes on the role of the new school teacher in Avonlea while continuing to experience the trials and tribulations of adolescence. As Anne matures and faces challenges such as balancing work and personal life, readers are drawn into her world of friendships, romance, and self-discovery.

books.title: Anne of the Island
books.summary: In Anne of the Island, Anne Shirley leaves Avonlea for college in Kingsport, where she experiences new adventures and encounters new friends and suitors. As Anne navigates the complexities of young adulthood, readers are swept up in her journey of personal growth, love, and the pursuit of her dreams.

books.title: Emily of New Moon
books.summary: Emily of New Moon follows the story of Emily Starr, an imaginative and spirited young girl who goes to live with her strict Aunt Elizabeth and mischievous Cousin Jimmy at New Moon Farm. As Emily grapples with loss, loneliness, and the challenges of fitting in, readers are captivated by her journey of self-discovery and creative expression.

books.title: Emily Climbs
books.summary: In Emily Climbs, the sequel to Emily of New Moon, Emily Starr continues her quest to become a successful writer while facing the highs and lows of adolescence and the complexities of love and friendship. As Emily navigates the literary world and her personal relationships, readers are drawn into a story of perseverance, passion, and the pursuit of one's dreams.

books.title: Emily's Quest
books.summary: Emily's Quest concludes the Emily trilogy as Emily Starr faces the ultimate challenge of finding true love and achieving her dreams of becoming a successful author. As Emily confronts heartbreak and self-doubt, readers are taken on an emotional journey of love, loss, and self-fulfillment in this captivating coming-of-age tale.

books.title: The Blue Castle
books.summary: The Blue Castle tells the story of Valancy Stirling, a repressed and timid young woman who discovers freedom and love after receiving a life-altering medical diagnosis. As Valancy embarks on a journey of self-discovery and personal transformation, readers are swept into a tale of courage, romance, and seizing the opportunity to live life to the fullest.

books.title: Kilmeny of the Orchard
books.summary: Kilmeny of the Orchard follows the story of Eric Marshall, a young man who falls in love with a mysterious and beautiful mute girl named Kilmeny. As Eric unravels Kilmeny's past and helps her find her voice, readers are transported to the enchanting world of the Prince Edward Island orchard, where love, music, and healing come together in a tale of heartwarming beauty.

books.title: The Story Girl
books.summary: The Story Girl follows a group of cousins spending a magical summer on Prince Edward Island, where they are captivated by the storytelling talents of their cousin Sara Stanley, known as the Story Girl. As Sara spins tales of adventure, romance, and mystery, readers are transported to a world of imagination and wonder in this heartwarming and nostalgic coming-of-age story.

books.title: The Golden Road
books.summary: The Golden Road continues the adventures of the cousins from The Story Girl as they navigate the joys and challenges of adolescence in their idyllic Prince Edward Island community. As the children grow and mature, they confront issues of friendship, family, and growing up, all while being drawn into the enchanting world of the Story Girl's vivid storytelling.

books.title: Howl's Moving Castle
books.summary: Howl's Moving Castle follows the story of Sophie, who is cursed to live as an old woman by the Witch of the Waste. She seeks refuge in the moving castle of the mysterious wizard Howl. As Sophie navigates the magical world of Ingary and gets to know Howl, she uncovers a dangerous plot that threatens both their lives.

books.title: Charmed Life
books.summary: Charmed Life introduces readers to siblings Cat and Gwendolen Chant, who are taken in by the enigmatic Chrestomanci after their parents die. Gwendolen's thirst for power sets in motion a series of events that tests the siblings' bond and reveals the true extent of their magical abilities.

books.title: Archer's Goon
books.summary: Archer's Goon centers around the Hath family and their dealings with the seven mysterious siblings known as the Goon. When Howard, the youngest Hath, is tasked with delivering 2,000 words to Archer, chaos ensues as the true nature of the siblings' power is revealed.

books.title: The Lives of Christopher Chant
books.summary: In The Lives of Christopher Chant, readers follow the adventures of Christopher Chant, a powerful enchanter with the ability to visit other worlds. As Christopher learns to master his magical abilities, he uncovers dark secrets that threaten the balance of the mystical world of Chrestomanci.

books.title: Fire and Hemlock
books.summary: Fire and Hemlock weaves a captivating tale of friendship, love, and the power of storytelling. Polly befriends the mysterious cellist Thomas Lynn and finds herself immersed in a world of myth and magic. As their bond deepens, Polly discovers that their connection goes beyond mere friendship.

books.title: Castle in the Air
books.summary: Castle in the Air introduces readers to Abdullah, a humble carpet merchant who dreams of grand adventures. When he purchases a magic carpet that leads him to a princess in peril, Abdullah must use his wits and courage to navigate a world of djinn, thieves, and flying cats.

books.title: Dark Lord of Derkholm
books.summary: Dark Lord of Derkholm follows the eccentric wizard Derk and his family as they reluctantly participate in a grand tour organized by the malicious Mr. Chesney. With magic and chaos abound, the family must navigate the whims of tourists and face the true threat lurking behind the facade of adventure.

books.title: A Tale of Time City
books.summary: A Tale of Time City takes readers on a thrilling journey to the enigmatic Time City, a place outside of time and space. When Vivian Smith is accidentally transported to Time City, she becomes embroiled in a quest to uncover a dark conspiracy that threatens the very fabric of reality.

books.title: The Ogre Downstairs
books.summary: The Ogre Downstairs explores the magical mayhem that ensues when the Copland family receives a mysterious chemistry set from their stepfather. As the siblings experiment with the potion recipes, they discover that the ingredients have unexpected and fantastical effects on their lives.

books.title: Witch's Business
books.summary: Witch's Business follows the misadventures of two siblings, Frank and Jess, who stumble upon a mysterious shop run by the sinister Mr. Pound. When they unwittingly become partners in Mr. Pound's peculiar business, they must navigate dangerous magic and dark secrets to free themselves from his clutches.

books.title: Swordbird
books.summary: In the realm of Stone-Run Forest, the peace was shattered by the Redwing, a group of birds corrupted by a dark power. Swordbird, a mythical creature of peace, has disappeared and it is up to heroes Alue, a brave swallow, and his friends to rescue Swordbird and restore peace to the forest.

books.title: Sword Quest
books.summary: In this sequel to Swordbird, Alue and his friends embark on a dangerous quest to find the missing Sword of Sorrow. Along the way, they face challenges, battles, and a journey that will test their bravery and loyalty to their cause.

books.title: Sword Mountain
books.summary: Continuing the adventures of Alue and his friends, Sword Mountain follows the group as they seek to climb the treacherous mountain to retrieve a magical sword that holds the key to defeating evil forces threatening their world.

books.title: Sword Dance
books.summary: In the fourth installment of the Swordbird series, Alue must learn the ways of a sacred sword dance in order to master a powerful new weapon that will aid in the battle against the forces of darkness.

books.title: Flying Free
books.summary: A young sparrow, Kai, dreams of flying free like the legendary Wind-Voice. When a prophecy foretells a great change, Kai must embark on a journey of self-discovery and bravery to fulfill his destiny.

books.title: A Dragon's Guide to Making Your Human Smarter
books.summary: When a young girl, Winnie, discovers a baby dragon, Miss Drake, in her home, she is thrust into a magical world of adventure and mischief. Together, they navigate the challenges of dragon-human relationships and uncover hidden secrets.

books.title: The Magic Paintbrush
books.summary: When young Lin Lin discovers a magic paintbrush that brings her drawings to life, she is faced with a choice between using its powers for good or succumbing to the temptations of unlimited creativity.

books.title: An Illustrated Treasury of Chinese Myths
books.summary: This beautifully illustrated collection presents classic Chinese myths and legends retold for young readers. From tales of dragons and princesses to epic battles and mystical creatures, these stories offer a glimpse into ancient Chinese folklore.

books.title: The Empty City
books.summary: In a world where humans have disappeared, a group of dogs must band together to survive in a desolate city. As they face challenges and dangers, they must rely on their instincts and teamwork to find food, shelter, and a sense of belonging.

books.title: Escape from the Land of Snows
books.summary: Tenzin, a young Tibetan boy, embarks on a perilous journey to escape Chinese authorities and reach India. Along the way, he faces harsh landscapes, dangerous enemies, and tests of courage as he fights for freedom and a better future.

books.title: Asterix the Gaul
books.summary: Asterix the Gaul is the first book in the popular Asterix series by Albert Uderzo. The story revolves around a small village of indomitable Gauls who resist Roman occupation with the help of a magical potion brewed by the local druid. Full of humor, clever wordplay, and exciting adventures, Asterix the Gaul is a timeless classic that appeals to readers of all ages.

books.title: Asterix and the Golden Sickle
books.summary: In this installment of the Asterix series, our heroes embark on a quest to find a golden sickle for the local druid, Getafix. Their journey takes them through various challenges and encounters with Romans, pirates, and other colorful characters. With its mix of humor, action, and historical references, Asterix and the Golden Sickle is sure to entertain readers of all ages.

books.title: Asterix and the Goths
books.summary: When the druid Getafix is kidnapped by the Goths, Asterix and his loyal friend Obelix must travel to Germania to rescue him. Along the way, they face numerous obstacles and hilarious situations as they outsmart their enemies and save the day. Asterix and the Goths is a delightful and entertaining adventure that showcases the bravery and wit of its beloved characters.

books.title: Asterix the Gladiator
books.summary: Captured by the Romans and forced to become gladiators, Asterix and Obelix must find a way to escape and return to their village. Through their trademark humor and cunning, they outsmart their captors and emerge victorious in a series of thrilling challenges. Asterix the Gladiator is a fast-paced and funny book that will keep readers of all ages engaged from beginning to end.

books.title: Asterix and the Banquet
books.summary: In Asterix and the Banquet, the Gauls decide to host a grand banquet for Chief Vitalstatistix. However, things take a chaotic turn when the Romans try to spoil the feast. Asterix and Obelix must use their ingenuity and strength to protect the village and ensure that the banquet goes on as planned. This hilarious and heartwarming story is filled with action, humor, and plenty of food-related antics.

books.title: Asterix and Cleopatra
books.summary: When Julius Caesar challenges Cleopatra to build a magnificent palace in three months, she turns to the Gauls for help. Asterix and Obelix travel to Egypt to assist in the construction, facing numerous obstacles and comical situations along the way. Asterix and Cleopatra is a delightful tale of friendship, teamwork, and cultural misunderstandings that will delight readers of all ages.

books.title: Asterix and the Big Fight
books.summary: In Asterix and the Big Fight, the Gauls face a new challenge when their neighboring village decides to challenge them to a fight. To avoid bloodshed, Asterix proposes a series of contests to determine the winner. With a mix of humor, wit, and slapstick action, this book showcases the Gauls' cleverness and camaraderie in the face of adversity.

books.title: Asterix in Britain
books.summary: When Julius Caesar invades Britain, Asterix and Obelix travel to the island to help the Britons resist Roman occupation. They face various challenges and encounters with eccentric characters as they strive to outwit the Romans and protect their British allies. Asterix in Britain is a hilarious and action-packed adventure that celebrates bravery, friendship, and cultural diversity.

books.title: Asterix and the Normans
books.summary: In Asterix and the Normans, the Gauls face a new threat when a group of Normans arrive in the village seeking fear. As the Gauls teach them the concept of true fear, chaos ensues with plenty of laughs and excitement. This humorous and heartwarming story explores themes of courage, acceptance, and the power of friendship in the face of perceived differences.

books.title: Asterix and the Laurel Wreath
books.summary: When Chief Vitalstatistix decides to participate in a Gaulish chief contest, Asterix and Obelix must help him win by obtaining a coveted laurel wreath. Their journey takes them on a series of amusing and daring adventures as they try to outsmart their competitors and secure victory for their village. Asterix and the Laurel Wreath is a fun-filled and action-packed tale of competition, friendship, and triumph.

books.title: Black Beauty
books.summary: Black Beauty is a classic novel narrated by a horse named Black Beauty. The story follows his life from his idyllic days as a young foal on a farm, through various owners and adventures, highlighting the mistreatment of horses and the importance of kindness and compassion.

books.title: The Autobiography of a Horse
books.summary: The Autobiography of a Horse is a lesser-known work by Anna Sewell, similar to Black Beauty in its focus on the treatment of horses. The book is narrated by a horse who shares his life story, reflecting on the experiences of kindness and cruelty he has encountered.

books.title: Beauty's Punishment
books.summary: Beauty's Punishment is an erotic novel that continues the story of Beauty from Anne Rice's Sleeping Beauty trilogy. Set in a medieval world of sexual servitude, the book explores Beauty's further adventures and encounters with pleasure and pain.

books.title: Beauty's Release
books.summary: Beauty's Release is the final book in Anne Rice's Sleeping Beauty trilogy. Continuing the story of Beauty's erotic adventures, the book delves deeper into themes of desire, power dynamics, and the consequences of indulging in fantasies of dominance and submission.

books.title: The Water-Babies
books.summary: The Water-Babies is a fairy tale written by Charles Kingsley, not Anna Sewell. It tells the story of a young chimney sweep named Tom who transforms into a water-baby and embarks on magical adventures in the underwater world. The book combines elements of fantasy, satire, and moral lessons.

books.title: Black Blackjack
books.summary: Black Blackjack is a children's novel by Anna Sewell, following the adventures of a mischievous black pony named Blackjack. The story explores themes of friendship, loyalty, and overcoming challenges, as Blackjack navigates a series of escapades with his human and animal friends.

books.title: The Children's Favourite
books.summary: The Children's Favourite is a collection of short stories for children by Anna Sewell. Each story features different animals as protagonists, teaching valuable lessons about compassion, courage, and friendship. The tales are engaging and heartwarming, perfect for young readers.

books.title: Life Slices
books.summary: Life Slices is a collection of short stories for adults by Anna Sewell, exploring the complexities of human relationships, emotions, and experiences. Each story offers a glimpse into the lives of diverse characters facing challenges and seeking meaning in their everyday existence.

books.title: Beyond the Horizon
books.summary: Beyond the Horizon is a novel for adults by Anna Sewell, following the journey of a woman named Sarah as she navigates love, loss, and self-discovery. The story weaves together themes of longing, resilience, and the pursuit of happiness, offering a poignant reflection on life's uncertainties.

books.title: Echoes of the Past
books.summary: Echoes of the Past is a mystery novel by Anna Sewell, delving into a series of interconnected crimes and secrets that span across generations. As the characters uncover the truths of the past, they are faced with unexpected revelations and moral dilemmas that challenge their perceptions of guilt and innocence.

books.title: The Tale of Peter Rabbit
books.summary: Follow the mischievous Peter Rabbit as he disobeys his mother and sneaks into Mr. McGregor's garden, leading to a series of adventurous encounters.

books.title: The Tale of Jemima Puddle-Duck
books.summary: Join Jemima Puddle-Duck, a kind-hearted duck who yearns for a safe place to lay her eggs away from the farmyard, in this heartwarming tale of friendship and bravery.

books.title: The Tale of Mrs. Tiggy-Winkle
books.summary: Meet Mrs. Tiggy-Winkle, a hedgehog washerwoman who helps various animals by washing and ironing their clothes in this charming story set in the English countryside.

books.title: The Tale of Squirrel Nutkin
books.summary: Join the cheeky Squirrel Nutkin and his friends as they sail to Owl Island to gather nuts, only to face the stern and unforgiving owl Old Brown in a thrilling adventure.

books.title: The Tale of Benjamin Bunny
books.summary: Accompany Benjamin Bunny, Peter Rabbit's cousin, as they return to Mr. McGregor's garden to retrieve Peter's lost clothes, encountering unexpected obstacles and dangers along the way.

books.title: The Tale of Tom Kitten
books.summary: Follow the mischievous Tom Kitten and his siblings as they struggle to stay neat and tidy in clothes made by their mother, despite their playful and messy adventures.

books.title: The Tale of Squirrel Nutkin
books.summary: Join the cheeky Squirrel Nutkin and his friends as they sail to Owl Island to gather nuts, only to face the stern and unforgiving owl Old Brown in a thrilling adventure.

books.title: The Tale of Timmy Tiptoes
books.summary: Discover the tale of Timmy Tiptoes, a squirrel who loses his home and must find a new one with his wife Goody, encountering friendly and not-so-friendly creatures on the way.

books.title: The Tale of Two Bad Mice
books.summary: Experience the antics of Hunca Munca and Tom Thumb, two mischievous mice who wreak havoc in a dollhouse, only to feel guilty and attempt to make amends in a heartwarming twist.

books.title: The Tale of Mr. Tod
books.summary: Enter the world of Mr. Tod, a fox who kidnaps Tommy Brock's children and intends to eat them, leading to a daring rescue mission orchestrated by the valiant Benjamin Bunny.

books.title: Mr Magnolia
books.summary: Mr Magnolia has many things, such as an old trumpet that goes rooty-toot, some very fat owls learning to hoot, a big purple dinosaur who's a magnificent brute, and two sisters who play the flute. But he is missing one thing - a boot! Follow Mr Magnolia on his whimsical journey to find the missing boot.

books.title: Clown
books.summary: This heartwarming story follows a little boy who dreams of being a clown. Despite his family's objections, he persists in following his dreams and eventually gets the opportunity to perform in a circus. Along the way, he learns important lessons about courage, perseverance, and the power of believing in oneself.

books.title: Cockatoos
books.summary: In this delightful tale, a group of cockatoos embark on a thrilling adventure around the world. From soaring over snowy mountains to diving into the deep blue sea, the cockatoos encounter unexpected challenges and forge lasting friendships. Join them on their colorful journey filled with excitement and wonder.

books.title: All Join In
books.summary: Get ready to join in the fun with this collection of lively poems and illustrations. From bouncing bunnies to stomping elephants, each poem encourages readers to participate in the action. Bursting with energy and humor, 'All Join In' is a perfect book for interactive storytelling and shared reading.

books.title: Angel Pavement
books.summary: Step into the enchanting world of Angel Pavement, where magical creatures and whimsical adventures await. When a shy little angel discovers a mysterious door leading to a hidden garden, she embarks on a journey of self-discovery and friendship. With beautiful illustrations and a heartwarming message, this book is sure to captivate young readers.

books.title: The Green Ship
books.summary: Join two young siblings on a magical voyage aboard the Green Ship, a mysterious vessel that appears in their town one night. As they explore the ship's enchanted rooms and meet its eccentric crew, they uncover secrets about the past and forge unforgettable memories. With its whimsical storyline and captivating illustrations, 'The Green Ship' is a delightful adventure for readers of all ages.

books.title: Fantastic Daisy Artichoke
books.summary: Meet Daisy Artichoke, a whimsical character with a talent for creating fantastic inventions. From a flying bicycle to a talking umbrella, Daisy's imagination knows no bounds. Join her on a series of imaginative adventures filled with laughter, creativity, and unexpected surprises. This charming tale celebrates the power of imagination and the joy of following your dreams.

books.title: Three Little Monkeys
books.summary: Follow the mischievous antics of three little monkeys as they swing through the jungle, causing chaos wherever they go. From teasing crocodiles to outsmarting tigers, these playful primates are full of surprises and laughter. With rhythmic text and vibrant illustrations, 'Three Little Monkeys' is a delightful read-aloud that will entertain young readers and parents alike.

books.title: Quentin Blake's ABC
books.summary: Discover the alphabet in a whole new way with Quentin Blake's whimsical illustrations. From acrobatic alligators to zany zebras, each letter comes to life in colorful and imaginative ways. Young readers will delight in exploring the playful characters and creative scenes in this delightful ABC book that is both educational and entertaining.

books.title: Ten Frogs Dix Grenouilles
books.summary: Join ten silly frogs on a counting adventure through the pond as they hop, leap, and splash their way to fun. With playful rhymes and lively illustrations, this interactive book teaches children how to count from one to ten in both English and French. Dive into the world of these colorful frogs and learn numbers in two languages with 'Ten Frogs Dix Grenouilles'.

books.title: Unreal!
books.summary: This collection of short stories by Paul Jennings features bizarre and unexpected events that challenge the characters. From a talking cat that causes chaos to a boy who discovers a strange power, these stories are full of humor and imagination.

books.title: Undone!
books.summary: In this book, Paul Jennings tells the story of a boy who finds himself in unusual and surreal situations after receiving a mysterious package. As he tries to unravel the truth behind the package, he discovers unexpected secrets and adventures.

books.title: Quirky Tails
books.summary: Paul Jennings presents a collection of quirky and funny stories about eccentric characters and their unusual experiences. From a cursed pen to a cat with mystical powers, these tales are sure to captivate young readers.

books.title: Wicked!
books.summary: This book by Paul Jennings follows the misadventures of a group of kids who discover a forbidden book that unleashes wicked and magical creatures into their world. The children must find a way to stop the chaos before it's too late.

books.title: Uncanny!
books.summary: In this collection of eerie and mysterious stories, Paul Jennings explores the boundaries between reality and the supernatural. From haunted dolls to spooky disappearances, these tales will send shivers down the spine of young readers.

books.title: Sticky Beak
books.summary: Follow the adventures of a boy named Sticky Beak who has a knack for getting into trouble and stumbling upon strange occurrences. With his loyal pet rat by his side, Sticky Beak navigates a world filled with secrets and surprises.

books.title: Uncovered!
books.summary: Join Paul Jennings on a journey of discovery and adventure as a young girl uncovers a hidden secret that could change her life forever. With suspense and intrigue at every turn, this book will keep young readers on the edge of their seats.

books.title: Tongue-Tied
books.summary: Experience the hilarious and heartwarming stories of children who find themselves in extraordinary predicaments that test their courage and wit. With witty dialogue and unexpected twists, Tongue-Tied is a delightful read for kids.

books.title: Parallel
books.summary: In this novel geared towards young adults, Paul Jennings explores the concept of parallel universes and the consequences of tampering with the fabric of reality. Join the protagonist on a mind-bending journey through alternate dimensions.

books.title: Butterfingers
books.summary: Meet Roger the Dodger, a boy with the clumsiest hands in the world, in this hilarious collection of stories by Paul Jennings. From disastrous pranks to unexpected adventures, Butterfingers will have young readers laughing out loud.

books.title: The Wolves of Willoughby Chase
books.summary: In this classic tale, cousins Sylvia and Bonnie face danger and treachery in their English country estate as they battle against the merciless wolves that have invaded their once peaceful home. A story of courage, friendship, and resilience.

books.title: Black Hearts in Battersea
books.summary: Simon, a young artist, arrives in London looking for his friend Dr. Field, but instead, he stumbles upon a sinister plot involving a royal mystery, a cruel villain, and a secret society. Join Simon on his thrilling adventure in this captivating historical novel.

books.title: Midnight Is a Place
books.summary: In the industrial city of Blastburn, Lucas Bell finds himself entangled in a web of intrigue and danger when he befriends the wealthy Josiah Pluck. Together, they uncover dark secrets and face perilous adversaries in a gripping and atmospheric story.

books.title: The Whispering Mountain
books.summary: Young Owen Hughes embarks on a quest to find a magical harp hidden in the legendary Whispering Mountain. Along the way, he encounters mythical creatures, ancient curses, and a world of enchantment in this enchanting fantasy adventure.

books.title: The Stolen Lake
books.summary: Dido Twite sets off on a perilous journey to the faraway land of New Cumbria to rescue the rightful ruler and reclaim the stolen lake. With twists and turns at every corner, Dido's bravery and cunning are put to the test in this thrilling fantasy tale.

books.title: Is Underground
books.summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, siblings Fritz and Emily search for safety and freedom in the underground city of Is. As they navigate a subterranean world filled with secrets and dangers, they must decide where their loyalties lie in this suspenseful YA novel.

books.title: The Haunting of Lamb House
books.summary: When Henry James takes up residence in Lamb House, strange occurrences and ghostly sightings lead him and his friends on a ghost-hunting adventure. As they delve into the house's dark past, they uncover chilling secrets with terrifying consequences.

books.title: The Cuckoo Tree
books.summary: Dido Twite returns in this thrilling mystery where she investigates a plot involving a lost heir, a cuckoo clock, and a treacherous conspiracy. With her quick wit and daring spirit, Dido unravels the mystery and faces her most dangerous foes yet.

books.title: The Serial Garden: The Complete Armitage Family Stories
books.summary: Step into the whimsical world of the Armitage family, where magic and mischief abound in their enchanted garden. Join Mark and Harriet as they encounter peculiar creatures, bewitched objects, and fantastical adventures in this charming fantasy collection.

books.title: Cold Shoulder Road
books.summary: In the seaside town of Skoga, Is Twite confronts a chilling mystery involving a missing girl, a haunted lighthouse, and a sinister plot. With the help of new allies and old friends, Is must unravel the truth before time runs out in this suspenseful YA novel.

books.title: Swallows and Amazons
books.summary: Follow the adventures of the Walker and Blackett children as they sail, explore, and camp on the wild islands of the Lake District in this classic tale of friendship, imagination, and outdoor escapades.

books.title: Pigeon Post
books.summary: Set in the Lake District, this book follows the Swallows and Amazons as they use carrier pigeons to communicate in a thrilling story of secret missions, codes, and camaraderie.

books.title: Winter Holiday
books.summary: Join the Swallows and Amazons for a winter adventure filled with skating, sledding, and exploring the frozen lake, as they encounter a mysterious visitor and solve a local mystery.

books.title: Coot Club
books.summary: Embark on a boating adventure with the Death and Glories crew as they defend their club from a pompous boating enthusiast in this delightful tale set on the Norfolk Broads.

books.title: We Didn't Mean to Go to Sea
books.summary: Accidental sailors John, Susan, Titty, and Roger face a dangerous voyage across the North Sea in this gripping story of survival, courage, and the power of friendship.

books.title: Secret Water
books.summary: Lost on a network of unfamiliar islands, the Swallows and Amazons must navigate treacherous waters, face fierce competition, and uncover hidden secrets in this thrilling maritime adventure.

books.title: The Big Six
books.summary: Join the Coot Club as they team up with the Death and Glories to solve a case of stolen boats, outsmart the thieves, and prove their detective skills in this exciting tale of intrigue.

books.title: Missee Lee
books.summary: Captured by the formidable pirate Missee Lee, the Swallows and Amazons must use all their wits and courage to escape her clutches and uncover the secrets of the South China Sea.

books.title: Great Northern?
books.summary: When the Swallows and Amazons are stranded in the North, they face icy challenges, encounters with Russian agents, and a thrilling race to rescue a kidnapped scientist in this gripping adventure.

books.title: The Picts and the Martyrs
books.summary: Join the Walker, Blackett, and Callum children as they uncover a hidden treasure, outsmart their adversaries, and prove their bravery and loyalty in this exciting tale set in the Lake District.

books.title: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
books.summary: Follow Dorothy Gale as she travels to the magical land of Oz, navigates through its whimsical characters and encounters challenges on her journey to meet the Wizard and find her way back home.

books.title: The Marvelous Land of Oz
books.summary: Join Tip, Jack Pumpkinhead, and the Sawhorse on an adventure in the land of Oz as they try to overthrow the evil Nome King and restore Princess Ozma to her rightful place as ruler.

books.title: Ozma of Oz
books.summary: Follow Dorothy as she gets shipwrecked in the Land of Ev, befriends new companions like Tik-Tok and Billina the yellow hen, and faces off against the formidable Nome King in order to rescue her friends.

books.title: Dorothy and the Wizard in Oz
books.summary: Join Dorothy, the Wizard, and new friends Zeb and Jim as they are swallowed by an earthquake and find themselves in the underground Land of the Mangaboos and the Valley of Voe, where they encounter strange adventures and creatures.

books.title: The Road to Oz
books.summary: Accompany Dorothy and her friends as they journey along the road to the Emerald City, meeting bizarre individuals like the Shaggy Man, Button-Bright, and Polychrome, the Rainbow's Daughter.

books.title: The Emerald City of Oz
books.summary: Follow Dorothy and her friends as they attempt to prevent the destruction of Oz by corrupt officials in the Nome Kingdom, and work together to save the beautiful Emerald City.

books.title: The Patchwork Girl of Oz
books.summary: Join Ojo, the Patchwork Girl Scraps, and the Glass Cat as they embark on a quest to find the ingredients for a magic potion to rescue Ojo's Uncle Nunkie from a petrified state in the Land of Oz.

books.title: Tik-Tok of Oz
books.summary: Accompany Betsy Bobbin and her mule Hank as they venture into the fairyland of Oz, where they meet Queen Ann Soforth, the army of Oogaboo, and work with Tik-Tok and the Shaggy Man to protect the Land of Oz.

books.title: The Scarecrow of Oz
books.summary: Join Cap'n Bill and Trot as they visit Oz and join forces with the Scarecrow, the Tin Woodman, and Glinda the Good Witch to save the missing Queen of the Scoodlers and uncover mysteries in the magical world.

books.title: Rinkitink in Oz
books.summary: Accompany Prince Inga of Pingaree, King Rinkitink, and Bilbil the goat as they travel to the land of Oz and face challenges from the wicked Nome King, the evil magician, and the sorceress Coo-ee-oh.

books.title: The Railway Children
books.summary: The Railway Children follows the story of three children whose lives change dramatically when their father is wrongly accused of a crime and sent to prison. They move to the countryside and befriend people around the nearby railway station. The children find joy in helping others and trying to prove their father's innocence.

books.title: Five Children and It
books.summary: Five Children and It is a fantasy novel about five siblings who discover a sand fairy called Psammead that grants them wishes. However, each wish comes with a twist, leading to humorous and magical adventures as the children learn valuable lessons about the consequences of their desires.

books.title: The Story of the Amulet
books.summary: The Story of the Amulet follows the adventures of four children who discover a magical amulet that allows them to travel through time. They embark on a journey to different eras in history, encountering mythical creatures and ancient civilizations, while trying to find a way to save their friends and change the future.

books.title: The Enchanted Castle
books.summary: The Enchanted Castle is a fantasy novel about three children who discover a magical castle with a secret garden. The children encounter statues that come to life, wishes that go awry, and a mysterious ring that grants them temporary powers. They must navigate the challenges of the enchanted castle while learning the importance of friendship and bravery.

books.title: The Wouldbegoods
books.summary: The Wouldbegoods is a humorous novel about a group of siblings who try to be good but often end up causing chaos and mischief instead. Their attempts at generosity and helpfulness backfire, leading to comical situations and valuable lessons about the importance of honesty and good intentions.

books.title: The Phoenix and the Carpet
books.summary: The Phoenix and the Carpet is a fantasy novel about four siblings who discover a magical carpet and a phoenix that hatches from an egg. The children go on fantastical adventures using the carpet to travel to distant lands and the phoenix to help them in times of need. They learn about responsibility and cooperation as they navigate the challenges of their magical possessions.

books.title: Harding's Luck
books.summary: Harding's Luck is a fantasy novel about a young boy named Harding who encounters a mysterious gypsy and is granted a magical token that brings him good luck. Harding's adventures take him to different places and times, where he meets new friends and faces challenges that test his courage and character.

books.title: The Magic City
books.summary: The Magic City is a fantasy novel about a boy named Philip who builds a magical city out of household objects and toys. When he falls asleep inside the city, he wakes up to find himself in a world filled with adventure and danger. Philip must navigate the challenges of the magic city and learn valuable lessons about imagination and creativity.

books.title: The House of Arden
books.summary: The House of Arden is a fantasy novel about two siblings, Edred and Elfrida, who inherit a magical estate with a hidden treasure. As they unravel the mysteries of the house and its history, they discover secrets that lead them on a quest through time and space to reclaim their family's rightful place in history.

books.title: New Treasure Seekers
books.summary: New Treasure Seekers is a collection of short stories featuring the Bastable siblings who embark on various adventures to find treasures and solve mysteries. The siblings use their wit, creativity, and teamwork to overcome obstacles and outsmart their rivals, showcasing the importance of perseverance and camaraderie.

books.title: Sylvester and the Magic Pebble
books.summary: Sylvester, a young donkey, discovers a magic pebble that grants wishes. However, when he accidentally turns himself into a rock, he must find a way to turn back and reunite with his family.

books.title: Abel's Island
books.summary: Abel, a mouse, becomes stranded on an uninhabited island and must learn to survive on his own. Through his adventures, he discovers the true meaning of resilience and perseverance.

books.title: Amos & Boris
books.summary: Amos, a mouse, and Boris, a whale, form an unlikely friendship that transcends their differences. When Boris saves Amos from a storm at sea, their bond is tested in unexpected ways.

books.title: Doctor De Soto
books.summary: Doctor De Soto, a mouse dentist, must treat a fox despite the inherent danger. Through wit and resourcefulness, he navigates the challenges of his profession while staying true to his compassionate nature.

books.title: The One and Only Shrek!
books.summary: Shrek, a grumpy ogre, embarks on a humorous and heartwarming journey to find his one true love. Along the way, he learns valuable lessons about acceptance and inner beauty.

books.title: Gorky Rises
books.summary: Gorky, a flying pig, unexpectedly takes to the skies and becomes a sensation. As fame and fortune beckon, Gorky must navigate a world filled with both admirers and detractors.

books.title: Pete's a Pizza
books.summary: Pete's parents turn him into a human pizza in a playful attempt to lift his spirits on a rainy day. Through imaginative play, Pete realizes the power of love and creativity in overcoming boredom.

books.title: Tiffky Doofky
books.summary: Tiffky Doofky, a small creature from planet Runk, faces ridicule for his unique appearance until he proves his worth through an act of bravery. A tale of acceptance and self-discovery.

books.title: Zabajaba Jungle
books.summary: Lenore and Daniel venture into the mysterious Zabajaba Jungle, where they encounter whimsical creatures and embark on an adventure that tests their courage and friendship.

books.title: The Amazing Bone
books.summary: Pearl, a pig, discovers a magical talking bone that helps her ward off danger. However, when the bone is stolen by a fox, Pearl must use her wits and bravery to reclaim it.

books.title: Walk Two Moons
books.summary: This novel follows 13-year-old Salamanca Tree Hiddle as she embarks on a cross-country journey with her grandparents. Along the way, Sal shares the story of her friend Phoebe, exploring themes of family, friendship, and loss.

books.title: Chasing Redbird
books.summary: When Zinny's family decides to clear an overgrown trail in their woods, she discovers more than just hidden secrets. As she uncovers the path, Zinny also confronts personal challenges and learns valuable lessons about identity and relationships.

books.title: Bloomability
books.summary: This novel follows 13-year-old Dinnie as she moves to Switzerland with her aunt and uncle. As Dinnie adjusts to her new surroundings, she discovers the beauty of life and the importance of embracing new experiences.

books.title: The Wanderer
books.summary: Thirteen-year-old Sophie embarks on a sailing adventure with her uncles and cousins. As she faces the challenges of the open sea, Sophie learns about courage, family bonds, and the true meaning of home.

books.title: Love That Dog
books.summary: Jack, a young boy, discovers his love for poetry through the guidance of his teacher and the poems of famous poets. Through Jack's own poetry, readers witness his emotional journey and growth.

books.title: Ruby Holler
books.summary: Twins Dallas and Florida find themselves in the care of eccentric siblings Tiller and Sairy in the magical town of Ruby Holler. Together, they embark on an unforgettable adventure that teaches them about love, family, and healing.

books.title: Granny Torrelli Makes Soup
books.summary: Rosie forms a special bond with her Italian grandmother, Granny Torrelli, as they cook together and navigate friendship, family, and the ups and downs of growing up. Through Granny Torrelli's wisdom and soup-making skills, Rosie learns valuable life lessons.

books.title: The Castle Corona
books.summary: In a kingdom where a castle holds mysterious secrets and two orphaned peasant siblings dream of a better life, unexpected connections and adventures unfold. With themes of friendship, courage, and destiny, this story takes readers on a captivating journey.

books.title: Heartbeat
books.summary: Annie loves to run with her grandfather, and together they share a special bond through their passion for running. As Annie navigates the challenges of growing up and her changing relationships, she learns about the importance of perseverance and family love.

books.title: Replay
books.summary: Leo, an aspiring rock musician, navigates the challenges of adolescence and self-discovery through music and relationships. As Leo learns to confront his past and embrace his future, readers accompany him on a journey of personal growth and resilience.

books.title: The Owl Who Was Afraid of the Dark
books.summary: Plop, the baby barn owl, is afraid of the dark. Through a series of encounters with different night creatures, Plop learns to appreciate darkness and overcome his fear.

books.title: The Gorilla Who Wanted to Grow Up
books.summary: Pongo, a young gorilla, wishes to grow up quickly to do all the things he sees the older gorillas doing. However, he soon realizes that growing up too fast comes with its own challenges.

books.title: The Penguin Who Wanted to Find Out
books.summary: Wrap, a young penguin, is curious about the world beyond his icy home. Along with his friend, he embarks on an exciting journey to learn more about the world.

books.title: The Aardvark Who Wasn't Sure
books.summary: Aardvark is unsure about what he should eat, as he doesn't like insects like other aardvarks. With the help of his friends, Aardvark learns to embrace his uniqueness.

books.title: The Cat Who Wanted to Go Home
books.summary: Suzy, the Scottish cat, gets lost while on vacation in France. Determined to find her way back home, Suzy encounters various challenges and friendly strangers who help her on her journey.

books.title: The Otter Who Wanted to Know
