books.summary: Oscar, the young otter, is curious about everything around him. His relentless questioning leads him on a learning adventure where he discovers the wonders of the world.

books.title: The Hen Who Wouldn't Give Up
books.summary: Hilda, the determined hen, encounters obstacles while trying to hatch her eggs. Despite facing setbacks, Hilda's perseverance and optimism shine through in this heartwarming tale.

books.title: The Cuckoo Who Flew
books.summary: Charlie, the young cuckoo, dreams of flying but is afraid to leave the safety of his nest. With encouragement from his friends, Charlie takes a leap of faith and discovers the joy of soaring high.

books.title: The Seal Who Came Home
books.summary: Sid, the adventurous seal, leaves the safety of the sea to explore the land. Along the way, he meets new friends and faces challenges that teach him the true meaning of home.

books.title: The Owl Who Was Wise
books.summary: Oscar, the wise old owl, shares his knowledge and life experiences with the younger animals in the forest. Through his stories, Oscar imparts valuable lessons about nature and the world.

books.title: The Baby-Sitters Club #1: Kristy's Great Idea
books.summary: In this first book of The Baby-Sitters Club series, Kristy Thomas starts a club with her friends where they offer their babysitting services to the residents of Stoneybrook. The club faces challenges and adventures as they navigate through babysitting jobs, school, and friendship dynamics.

books.title: A Dog's Life: The Autobiography of a Stray
books.summary: This heartwarming story follows the life of a stray dog named Squirrel and her journey through various hardships and experiences. From living on the streets to finding a loving home, Squirrel's tale is filled with hope, resilience, and the power of companionship.

books.title: Belle Teal
books.summary: Set in the 1960s, this novel revolves around a young girl named Belle Teal who faces challenges within her family and community. As Belle navigates changes and hardships, she discovers the importance of love, understanding, and the strength to overcome adversity.

books.title: A Corner of the Universe
books.summary: This poignant story follows the life of 12-year-old Hattie as she learns about acceptance, empathy, and the complexities of relationships. Through her friendship with an unconventional guest, Hattie explores the meaning of belonging and the beauty found in unexpected moments.

books.title: Here Today
books.summary: In this touching novel, Ellie and her grandmother navigate the challenges of Alzheimer's disease and its impact on their bond. As Ellie grapples with loss and memories slipping away, she discovers the enduring power of love, family, and the strength to cherish each moment.

books.title: Ten Kids, No Pets
books.summary: The Rosso family faces a major change when they move to a new house that doesn't allow pets. As the ten siblings adjust to their new home and overcome differences, they embark on a journey of togetherness, humor, and the importance of family bonds.

books.title: Welcome to Camden Falls
books.summary: When Flora and Ruby are sent to live with their grandmother in Camden Falls, they find new friends and a sense of community in this charming town. As the sisters adjust to their new life and forge connections, they learn about resilience, kindness, and the power of family.

books.title: A Corner of the Universe
books.summary: In a small town, Ann finds friendship and understanding in an unlikely ally. As they navigate personal struggles and societal expectations, Ann and her friend discover the beauty of acceptance, empathy, and the importance of being true to oneself.

books.title: Main Street #1: Welcome to Camden Falls
books.summary: In the first book of the Main Street series, Flora and Ruby arrive in Camden Falls to live with their grandmother. As the sisters adjust to their new surroundings and build connections with the town's residents, they uncover the warmth, challenges, and joys of small-town life.

books.title: Rain Reign
books.summary: Rose Howard's world revolves around rules, prime numbers, and her loyal dog Rain. When Rain goes missing during a storm, Rose embarks on a journey to find her beloved companion, ultimately discovering the power of love, loss, and the importance of embracing change.

books.title: Shiloh
books.summary: Eleven-year-old Marty Preston finds a mistreated beagle in the hills near his West Virginia home. As he grows closer to the dog, he learns the true meaning of love, loyalty, and friendship.

books.title: The Agony of Alice
books.summary: Alice McKinley navigates the challenges of being a sixth-grader, dealing with friendship struggles, family dynamics, and the pains of growing up.

books.title: Saving Shiloh
books.summary: In the third book of the Shiloh series, Marty must protect his beloved beagle from an abusive owner who wants him back, leading to a tense and emotional showdown.

books.title: Jade Green: A Ghost Story
books.summary: After moving in with her Aunt Brandy, Judith discovers a dark secret about a sinister ghost named Jade Green, and must confront the supernatural forces haunting her new home.

books.title: Boys in Control
books.summary: Alice McKinley faces new challenges in eighth grade as she navigates relationships, school, and family dynamics, while trying to maintain control over her life.

books.title: Faith, Hope, and Ivy June
books.summary: Two girls from different backgrounds, Ivy June and Catherine, participate in an exchange program that teaches them about friendship, understanding, and acceptance.

books.title: Shiloh Season
books.summary: Marty grapples with the responsibilities of caring for his beloved dog, Shiloh, while facing external pressures that threaten their bond in the sequel to 'Shiloh'.

books.title: Blizzard's Wake
books.summary: When a blizzard traps his family in their mountain cabin, and his father disappears, Jim Dowden must lead his younger siblings to safety in this gripping historical tale of survival.

books.title: Alice Alone
books.summary: In this installment of the Alice series, Alice's mother gets remarried, leading to changes in their family dynamic and forcing Alice to adjust to a new normal.

books.title: Jade Green, A Ghost Story
books.summary: When Judith moves in with her aunt, strange things start happening. She uncovers a dark secret and learns about Jade Green, a ghost who needs her help.

books.title: What the Witch Left
books.summary: When Amanda and her brother Jody find a mysterious box left by a witch, they uncover its magical secrets and embark on a thrilling adventure to uncover the mystery behind the witch's disappearance.

books.title: The Wicked, Wicked Ladies in the Haunted House
books.summary: Siblings Barbara and Rick explore a haunted house and encounter a group of mischievous witches who are up to no good. Can Barbara and Rick solve the mystery of the wicked ladies before it's too late?

books.title: The Hidden Cave Mystery
books.summary: When Susan and Amy discover a hidden cave in the woods, they stumble upon a secret world filled with magical creatures and ancient mysteries. Join them on a daring quest to unlock the secrets of the hidden cave.

books.title: The Trouble with Magic
books.summary: When Carrie and Nick accidentally unleash a mischievous magic spell, chaos ensues in their town. Can they set things right and learn to control their newfound magical powers before it's too late?

books.title: Do-It-Yourself Magic
books.summary: Twins Toby and Becky discover an old book of magic spells and decide to try them out for themselves. But when their spells go awry, they must find a way to fix their magical mishaps before disaster strikes.

books.title: The Scarlett Slipper Mystery
books.summary: Best friends Nora and Tessa stumble upon a mysterious pair of scarlet slippers that seem to possess magical powers. Join them as they unravel the secrets behind the scarlet slippers and solve the puzzling mystery.

books.title: The Witch's Buttons
books.summary: When Anne and Emily discover a jar filled with enchanted buttons, they inadvertently release a mischievous witch who causes havoc in their town. Can they figure out how to stop the witch's mischief and save the day?

books.title: Magic in the Park
books.summary: When cousins Laura and Jack stumble upon a magical park hidden in the depths of the forest, they find themselves swept into a fantastical adventure filled with talking animals, hidden powers, and a dark secret waiting to be uncovered.

books.title: The Wednesday Witch
books.summary: When a mysterious old woman named Mrs. Gray moves in next door, Mary uncovers her neighbor's magical secret - she's a real witch! Join Mary as she learns the true meaning of friendship, courage, and magic in this heartwarming tale.

books.title: Summer Magic
books.summary: Siblings Mark and Cathy discover a hidden garden behind their new house that is filled with magical wonders and strange creatures. Follow their enchanting summer adventures as they befriend magical beings and uncover the garden's secrets.

books.title: Blast to the Past: Lincoln's Legacy
books.summary: In this time-travel adventure, a group of kids find themselves transported back in time to meet Abraham Lincoln and learn about the challenges he faced during his presidency, including the Civil War and the abolition of slavery.

books.title: The Friendship Code (Girls Who Code, Book 1)
books.summary: This book follows a group of girls who form a coding club and use their computer science skills to solve mysteries and help their community, highlighting the importance of collaboration and friendship in technology.

books.title: Barbie: I Can Be...A Pet Vet
books.summary: In this story, Barbie takes on the role of a pet vet, caring for animals and teaching young readers about compassion, responsibility, and the importance of taking care of pets.

books.title: Lego Nexo Knights: Macy and the King's Tournament
books.summary: Join Macy and the Nexo Knights as they compete in the King's Tournament, facing challenges and battles to prove their bravery and protect the kingdom from evil forces.

books.title: The Demon Thief (The Last Apprentice, Book 2)
books.summary: In this dark and suspenseful fantasy novel, a young apprentice must use his skills and bravery to defeat a powerful demon threatening to unleash chaos and destruction upon the world.

books.title: Over the Moon (Magic School Bus Rides Again)
books.summary: Ms. Frizzle and her class blast off to the moon in this thrilling science fiction adventure, where they explore lunar landscapes, encounter space creatures, and learn about the wonders of outer space.

books.title: Barbie Spy Squad (Pictureback)
books.summary: Join Barbie and her friends as they embark on a spy mission to save the world from a villain's evil plot, using their spy skills, teamwork, and determination to overcome challenges and succeed.

books.title: Lego Friends: Friends to the Rescue
books.summary: Step into the world of Heartlake City with the Lego Friends as they work together to rescue a lost puppy, showcasing the power of friendship, creativity, and problem-solving.

books.title: Barbie: The Princess & The Popstar
books.summary: Follow Barbie as she navigates dual roles as a princess and a popstar, learning valuable lessons about staying true to oneself, embracing differences, and the importance of friendship and teamwork.

books.title: The Ice Dragon: A Classic Story from The World of the Iron Druid Chronicles
books.summary: Set in the world of The Iron Druid Chronicles, this action-packed novel follows a young boy and his ice dragon as they face danger, betrayal, and epic battles, testing their bond and courage in the face of adversity.

books.title: Arthur's Chicken Pox
books.summary: When Arthur catches chicken pox, he worries that he won't be able to attend the class picnic. Join him on this heartwarming journey as he learns the true meaning of friendship and caring for others.

books.title: Arthur's Halloween
books.summary: Arthur and his friends embark on a spooky adventure to find the perfect Halloween costumes. Follow along as they encounter fun and frights in this delightful tale.

books.title: Arthur's Valentine
books.summary: Arthur decides to create the perfect Valentine's Day card for his secret crush. Experience the joy and nervousness of young love in this charming story.

books.title: Arthur's Loose Tooth
books.summary: Arthur's loose tooth causes him anxiety and excitement. Join him as he navigates the ups and downs of losing a tooth in this relatable and humorous tale.

books.title: Arthur Meets the President
books.summary: Arthur is thrilled to meet the President of the United States during his visit to Elwood City. Follow Arthur's adventures as he learns about leadership and responsibility in this inspiring story.

books.title: Arthur Writes a Story
books.summary: When Arthur struggles to write a story for a class assignment, he seeks inspiration from his friends and family. Join him on a writing journey full of creativity and imagination.

books.title: Arthur's April Fool
books.summary: Arthur decides to play a funny prank on his friends for April Fools' Day. Discover the hilarious consequences of his practical joke in this light-hearted and entertaining tale.

books.title: Arthur's Computer Disaster
books.summary: Arthur faces a technology meltdown when his computer crashes just before a big school project is due. Join him on a troubleshooting adventure filled with laughs and lessons.

books.title: Arthur's Family Vacation
books.summary: Arthur and his family set off on a summer vacation filled with unexpected twists and turns. Experience the joys and challenges of family bonding in this heartwarming story.

books.title: Arthur's Christmas
books.summary: Arthur prepares for the holiday season by helping his family and friends in need. Join him as he learns the true spirit of Christmas through acts of kindness and generosity.

books.title: Skellig
books.summary: Skellig is a children's fantasy novel that follows the story of Michael, who discovers a mysterious creature named Skellig in the garage of his new home. As Michael befriends Skellig and tries to help him, he uncovers secrets about his own life and finds hope and healing in unexpected places.

books.title: Kit's Wilderness
books.summary: Kit's Wilderness is a coming-of-age novel that follows the story of Kit and his friends as they explore an abandoned coal mine and uncover dark secrets from the past. As Kit navigates friendship, family, and loss, he learns the importance of connection and facing the unknown.

books.title: Heaven Eyes
books.summary: Heaven Eyes is a magical realism novel that follows the journey of Erin, January, and Mouse as they escape their troubled pasts and find refuge in an abandoned building called the Castel. As they build a new family and confront their fears, they discover the power of storytelling and imagination.

books.title: Clay
books.summary: Clay is a children's novel that follows the story of Davie, a young boy who befriends a mysterious boy named Stephen Rose. As Davie learns about Stephen's troubled past and helps him create sculptures out of clay, he discovers the beauty of friendship and the healing power of art.

books.title: The Fire-Eaters
books.summary: The Fire-Eaters is a historical fiction novel set in the 1960s during the Cuban Missile Crisis. It follows the story of Bobby, who befriends an eccentric man known as the Fire-Eater and learns about love, loss, and the complexities of human nature against the backdrop of global tensions.

books.title: A Song for Ella Grey
books.summary: A Song for Ella Grey is a modern retelling of the myth of Orpheus and Eurydice, set in a seaside town in England. It follows the story of Claire as she narrates the tragic love story of her friend Ella Grey and Orpheus, exploring themes of friendship, loss, and the power of music.

books.title: My Name is Mina
books.summary: My Name is Mina is a prequel to Skellig that follows the story of Mina, a young girl who loves nature, poetry, and questioning the world around her. Through Mina's diary entries and musings, readers discover her unique perspective on life, learning, and the beauty of the ordinary.

books.title: Secret Heart
books.summary: Secret Heart is a contemporary young adult novel that follows the story of Joe Maloney, a teenage boy dealing with family struggles and romantic feelings for his best friend. As Joe navigates his emotions and relationships, he learns about the complexities of love, acceptance, and growing up.

books.title: The Boy Who Swam with Piranhas
books.summary: The Boy Who Swam with Piranhas is a whimsical children's novel that follows the adventure of Stanley Potts, a boy who runs away to join a traveling circus. Through quirky characters and outrageous challenges, Stanley discovers courage, independence, and the importance of following your dreams.

books.title: The True Tale of the Monster Billy Dean
books.summary: The True Tale of the Monster Billy Dean is a dystopian novel written in verse that follows the story of Billy Dean, a boy born in a post-apocalyptic world where language and communication are forbidden. As Billy struggles to find his voice and identity, he embarks on a journey of self-discovery and resistance.

books.title: Patty Jane's House of Curl
books.summary: This heartwarming novel follows the story of two sisters, Patty Jane and Harriet, as they navigate life's ups and downs while running a successful beauty salon in Minnesota. Filled with humor, love, and poignant moments, the book explores themes of family, friendship, and resilience.

books.title: Angry Housewives Eating Bon Bons
books.summary: Set in a suburban neighborhood in Minnesota, this novel follows the lives of five women who form a book club and support each other through various challenges. As their friendships deepen, they discover the power of community and female solidarity.

books.title: Oh My Stars
books.summary: This heartfelt novel introduces readers to Violet Mathers, a young woman who embarks on a road trip with a mysterious African American man during the Great Depression. Through their journey, Violet learns about love, forgiveness, and the importance of embracing one's true self.

books.title: Tall Pine Polka
books.summary: In this charming novel, readers are transported to a small town in Minnesota where a diverse cast of characters comes together to save their local theater from financial ruin. Filled with quirky humor and endearing moments, the book celebrates community, creativity, and the power of art.

books.title: Welcome to the Great Mysterious
books.summary: This touching novel follows the intersecting lives of two women, Geneva and her adopted daughter, Geneva, as they navigate love, loss, and redemption. With themes of family, healing, and second chances, the book explores the complexities of human relationships.

books.title: Best to Laugh
books.summary: In this delightful novel, readers follow the hilarious misadventures of Candy Pekkala, a young comedian who moves to Los Angeles with dreams of making it big in Hollywood. Filled with humor, wit, and heart, the book captures the essence of pursuing one's passion against all odds.

books.title: The View from Mount Joy
books.summary: This coming-of-age novel follows the journey of young Joe Anderson as he navigates high school, friendship, and the complexities of family dynamics in a small town in Minnesota. With wit, humor, and relatable characters, the book explores the challenges and triumphs of adolescence.

books.title: Mayor of the Universe
books.summary: In this whimsical novel, readers meet Lucy, a high school student who runs for mayor of her small town as a joke but becomes embroiled in a surprising and inspiring campaign. With themes of leadership, friendship, and community activism, the book offers a fresh take on teenage rebellion and empowerment.

books.title: Once in a Blue Moon Lodge
books.summary: This novel follows the lives of two women, Delphine and Sven, as they navigate family secrets, love, and life's unexpected twists and turns. Spanning decades and generations, the book explores the enduring bonds of friendship and the power of forgiveness and redemption.

books.title: Chronicles of a Radical Hag (with Recipes)
books.summary: This charming novel centers around the life of Haze Evans, a small-town newspaper columnist who touches the lives of her readers with her insightful and humorous columns. When Haze passes away, her obituary sparks a series of events that bring the community together in unexpected ways.

books.title: The Story of Tracy Beaker
books.summary: Tracy Beaker is a feisty and imaginative young girl growing up in a children's home. Told through Tracy's own voice, the story follows her adventures and struggles as she deals with the challenges of foster care, friendship, and family.

books.title: Double Act
books.summary: Identical twins Ruby and Garnet are inseparable until their new stepmother enters their lives, threatening to tear them apart. As they navigate family dynamics and personal growth, the girls learn that change can be both difficult and empowering.

books.title: The Illustrated Mum
books.summary: Dolphin and Star live with their unconventional mother, Marigold, whose body is covered in tattoos. As the girls grapple with their mother's mental health struggles and find solace in their close bond, they discover the beauty of imperfection and acceptance.

books.title: Hetty Feather
books.summary: Orphaned at a young age, Hetty Feather navigates the challenges of life in the Victorian era while dreaming of finding her real mother. Along her journey, Hetty faces adversity, forms lasting friendships, and learns the true meaning of family.

books.title: Vicky Angel
books.summary: When best friends Jade and Vicky get into a car accident, Vicky tragically loses her life. But Vicky's presence continues to haunt Jade in unexpected ways, leading her on a journey of grief, guilt, and self-discovery.

books.title: The Lottie Project
books.summary: Charlie becomes fascinated with the life of Victorian servant Lottie and decides to write a school project about her. As Charlie immerses herself in Lottie's world, she uncovers surprising connections and learns valuable lessons about history and empathy.

books.title: Bad Girls
books.summary: Mandy is sent to a detention center for a crime she didn't commit, where she meets a group of rebellious girls with their own troubled pasts. Together, they form unlikely friendships and confront their demons in a challenging environment.

books.title: The Diamond Girls
books.summary: Dixie and her sisters live with their young mother after their father leaves the family. As they navigate the complexities of family relationships and adolescence, the Diamond girls discover the power of resilience and sisterhood.

books.title: Sleepovers
books.summary: When Daisy befriends new girl Kaitlyn, she is drawn into Kaitlyn's glamorous world and becomes involved in a complicated love triangle. As Daisy navigates friendship, romance, and betrayal, she learns important truths about herself and her values.

books.title: The Suitcase Kid
books.summary: When her parents divorce, Andy must split her time between two homes and navigate the challenges of blended families. With the help of her imaginary friend, Radish, Andy copes with feelings of loss and confusion while seeking comfort and stability.

books.title: The Stinky Cheese Man and Other Fairly Stupid Tales
books.summary: This humorous collection of twisted fairy tales features unconventional characters and unexpected plot twists that will entertain young readers and adults alike. The stories are reimagined in a playful and irreverent way, with a focus on humor and creativity.

books.title: The True Story of the 3 Little Pigs
books.summary: In this clever retelling of the classic tale of the Three Little Pigs, the Big Bad Wolf gets a chance to tell his side of the story. Readers will enjoy the humorous and unexpected twist on a familiar fairy tale.

books.title: Math Curse
books.summary: When a student wakes up one day to find that everything in her world has turned into a math problem, she embarks on a quest to solve the ultimate math curse. This humorous and educational book explores the challenges of math in a fun and engaging way.

books.title: Baloney (Henry P.)
books.summary: Henry P. Baloney is a funny and quirky character who shares his humorous thoughts and adventures with readers. Through a series of short stories and comic strips, Henry navigates the ups and downs of everyday life in a humorous and relatable way.

books.title: Science Verse
books.summary: This unique blend of science and poetry takes readers on a journey through the wonders of the natural world. Each poem in the collection explores a different scientific concept, from atoms to ecosystems, in a fun and imaginative way.

books.title: The Frog Prince, Continued
books.summary: This quirky and whimsical tale follows the Frog Prince after his happily ever after. Readers will enjoy discovering what happens next in the prince's story as he navigates new challenges and adventures in a humorous and entertaining way.

books.title: Robot Zot!
books.summary: Robot Zot is a fearless and determined robot who crash lands on Earth and embarks on a mission to conquer the planet. This action-packed and humorous story follows Robot Zot as he faces off against various characters and obstacles in his quest for domination.

books.title: The Time Warp Trio series
books.summary: Follow the time-traveling adventures of Joe, Fred, and Sam in this exciting series. Each book in the Time Warp Trio series takes the three friends on a different historical adventure full of humor, suspense, and unexpected twists.

books.title: Guys Read: Funny Business
books.summary: This collection of funny stories by various authors, edited by Jon Scieszka, is sure to tickle the funny bone of young readers. From humorous poems to quirky tales, each story in the anthology offers a mix of laughs and entertainment.

books.title: The Good, the Bad, and the Goofy
books.summary: Join the Time Warp Trio as they embark on another zany time-traveling adventure. In this book, Joe, Fred, and Sam find themselves in the Wild West, facing off against outlaws and navigating hilarious and unpredictable situations.

books.title: Pinkalicious
books.summary: Pinkalicious is a young girl who loves everything pink. When she eats too many pink cupcakes and turns pink herself, she learns that sometimes you can have too much of a good thing.

books.title: Silverlicious
books.summary: In this story, Pinkalicious loses her sweet tooth. With the help of a magical tooth fairy, she embarks on a journey to learn the value of kindness and generosity.

books.title: Goldilicious
books.summary: Pinkalicious discovers a magical unicorn named Goldilicious in this enchanting tale. Together, they explore a world of imagination and wonder.

books.title: Emeraldalicious
books.summary: Join Pinkalicious as she goes on an adventure to save the environment by planting a beautiful garden filled with emerald greenery and magical surprises.

books.title: Aqualicious
books.summary: Pinkalicious and her brother Peter visit the aquarium where they encounter various sea creatures. Through their underwater exploration, they learn valuable lessons about marine life.

books.title: Peterrific
books.summary: Peter, Pinkalicious's little brother, takes center stage in this story as he discovers his own unique talents and interests with the support of his family.

books.title: Pinkalicious: School Rules!
books.summary: Pinkalicious and her friends navigate the ups and downs of school life in this book full of fun, friendship, and important lessons about following the rules.

books.title: Pinkalicious: Story Time
books.summary: Join Pinkalicious and her friends as they embark on exciting adventures inspired by their favorite stories during a magical story time at the library.

books.title: Pinkalicious: Fairy House
books.summary: Pinkalicious and her brother build a fairy house in their backyard to attract magical creatures. Through teamwork and creativity, they create a whimsical home for fairies.

books.title: Pinkalicious and the Perfect Present
books.summary: When Pinkalicious struggles to find the perfect present for her mom's birthday, she learns that the best gifts come from the heart. Join her on a heartwarming journey of love and surprises.

books.title: Strega Nona
books.summary: Strega Nona is a classic children's book about an Italian grandmother, Strega Nona, who possesses magical powers. When Big Anthony tries to use her pasta pot without permission, chaos ensues. This heartwarming story teaches valuable lessons about responsibility and consequences.

books.title: Bill and Pete
books.summary: Bill, a young crocodile, and Pete, his bird friend, go on exciting adventures together. When Pete gets captured by a hunter, Bill must find a way to rescue him. This charming tale showcases the power of friendship and bravery.

books.title: Oliver Button Is a Sissy
books.summary: Oliver Button loves to dance, but he faces teasing and bullying from his classmates for not conforming to traditional gender stereotypes. This heartfelt story promotes acceptance, self-expression, and the importance of being true to oneself.

books.title: The Art Lesson
books.summary: Tommy loves to draw and dreams of becoming an artist. When his teacher limits his creativity, Tommy must find a way to express himself authentically. This inspiring tale celebrates artistic passion and determination.

books.title: Jamie O'Rourke and the Big Potato
books.summary: Jamie O'Rourke, a lazy potato farmer, gets a magical seed that grows into an enormous potato. As the potato becomes too big to handle, Jamie learns the value of hard work and cooperation. This humorous story highlights the importance of responsibility.

books.title: Now One Foot, Now the Other
books.summary: Bobby's grandfather, Bob, suffers a stroke and learns to walk again with Bobby's help. Through Bob's recovery journey, Bobby learns about resilience, empathy, and the bond between generations. This touching story emphasizes family support and perseverance.

books.title: The Legend of the Poinsettia
books.summary: Lucida wants to make a blanket for the Baby Jesus in the Christmas procession but lacks resources. Through kindness and generosity, Lucida discovers the true spirit of giving. This heartwarming tale explores the magic of Christmas traditions.

books.title: The Clown of God
books.summary: Giovanni, a juggler, performs for the Christ Child with the only gift he has—his talent. As Giovanni grows old, his juggling skills fade, but a miracle occurs during his final performance. This poignant story celebrates the gift of self-expression and faith.

books.title: Tomie dePaola's Book of Poems
books.summary: This collection features a variety of poems, including humorous rhymes, thoughtful verses, and playful imagery. Each poem showcases Tomie dePaola's signature style and creativity, making it a delightful read for young poetry enthusiasts.

books.title: Meet the Barkers
books.summary: The Barker family, including twins Morgan and Moffat, embark on everyday adventures filled with fun and surprises. From birthday parties to school projects, the Barkers navigate challenges with humor and love. This delightful story celebrates family bonds and togetherness.

books.title: The Giver
books.summary: In a seemingly perfect society, a young boy named Jonas is chosen to be the Receiver of Memories, a role that exposes him to the dark and complex truths of the world. As he uncovers the secrets of his society, Jonas must decide whether to uphold the status quo or fight for change.

books.title: Number the Stars
books.summary: During World War II, a young girl named Annemarie risks her life to help her Jewish friend escape from the Nazis in Nazi-occupied Denmark. The book explores themes of courage, friendship, and standing up against injustice.

books.title: The Willoughbys
books.summary: Four siblings, fed up with their neglectful and selfish parents, set out to become orphans in order to find a more loving and caring family. The story is a humorous and quirky take on traditional family dynamics.

books.title: Anastasia Krupnik
books.summary: Anastasia Krupnik, a precocious and creative 10-year-old girl, navigates the ups and downs of adolescence while dealing with family, friendships, and her own dreams and aspirations. The book captures the humor and challenges of growing up.

books.title: Messenger
books.summary: In this companion novel to 'The Giver' series, a boy named Matty embarks on a dangerous journey to bring healing to his community. Along the way, he discovers the power of empathy, sacrifice, and the interconnectedness of all creatures.

books.title: Gossamer
books.summary: In this whimsical tale, dream-givers explore the dreams of a troubled boy named John. Through their efforts, they help him confront his fears and find hope and healing in the power of dreams.

books.title: Gooney Bird Greene
books.summary: Young students in a classroom are captivated by their new classmate, Gooney Bird Greene, who tells wild and entertaining stories that blend truth and imagination. As the children learn from her storytelling, they also uncover the mysteries of friendship and creativity.

books.title: Son
books.summary: A girl named Claire, who is searching for her missing son, embarks on a journey through different communities with unique customs and challenges. As she reunites with her son, Claire must confront her past and fight for a future free from oppression.

books.title: The Silent Boy
books.summary: A young girl named Katy befriends a boy named Jacob, who is considered an outcast due to his silence and mysterious behavior. Through their bond, Katy uncovers the secrets of Jacob's past and learns valuable lessons about compassion and understanding.

books.title: The Birthday Ball
books.summary: Princess Patricia Priscilla is dreading her upcoming 16th birthday ball, where she is expected to choose a suitor. With the help of her fairy godmother, Patricia concocts a plan to attend the ball in disguise, leading to humorous and unexpected adventures.

books.title: Neverwhere
books.summary: Neverwhere follows the journey of Richard Mayhew into the dark and fantastical world of London Below where he encounters strange characters and embarks on a quest to save a girl named Door from a mysterious conspiracy.

books.title: American Gods
books.summary: American Gods tells the story of ex-convict Shadow Moon as he gets entangled in a war between the deities of the old world and the new gods of America, all while navigating a surreal road trip through the heartland of the United States.

books.title: Coraline
books.summary: Coraline follows a young girl who discovers a parallel world where everything seems perfect, only to realize that it's a sinister trap set by the Other Mother who wants to keep her there forever.

books.title: The Graveyard Book
books.summary: The Graveyard Book follows the life of Nobody Owens, a boy raised by ghosts in a graveyard, as he navigates the challenges of growing up and discovers his connection to the world of the living.

books.title: Stardust
books.summary: Stardust is a fairy tale about a young man named Tristan Thorn who ventures into the magical realm of Faerie to find a fallen star and discovers a world of adventure, love, and peril.

books.title: Good Omens (with Terry Pratchett)
books.summary: Good Omens follows the unlikely team-up of an angel and a demon as they try to prevent the apocalypse, with humor and wit, against the backdrop of a world that is both absurd and familiar.

books.title: The Ocean at the End of the Lane
books.summary: The Ocean at the End of the Lane is a haunting and nostalgic tale of a man who revisits his childhood home and recalls a series of otherworldly events involving a mysterious family and a dark power.

books.title: Norse Mythology
books.summary: Norse Mythology retells the epic myths of the Norse gods, including Odin, Thor, and Loki, in Gaiman's distinctive voice, bringing these ancient stories to life for a modern audience.

books.title: Trigger Warning: Short Fictions and Disturbances
books.summary: Trigger Warning is a collection of diverse and provocative short stories spanning various genres, from fantasy to horror, showcasing Gaiman's talent for storytelling and his unique imagination.

books.title: Anansi Boys
books.summary: Anansi Boys follows the misadventures of Fat Charlie Nancy, whose life gets turned upside down when he discovers his estranged father was the trickster god Anansi, leading to a series of humorous and magical escapades.

books.title: The Hunt for Red October
books.summary: A gripping Cold War thriller about a Soviet submarine captain's defection to the United States aboard the revolutionary submarine Red October.

books.title: Clear and Present Danger
books.summary: CIA analyst Jack Ryan is thrust into a dangerous confrontation with a powerful drug cartel in Colombia while discovering shocking government secrets.

books.title: Rainbow Six
books.summary: An elite international counter-terrorism unit, Rainbow, faces a global threat as they race against time to stop a group planning a series of deadly attacks.

books.title: The Sum of All Fears
books.summary: Jack Ryan, now the President, navigates the dangers of a rogue nuclear terrorist attack and the escalating tensions between nuclear powers.

books.title: Patriot Games
books.summary: Former Marine Jack Ryan becomes entangled in a deadly international terrorist plot while on vacation in London.

books.title: Executive Orders
books.summary: Jack Ryan must lead a nation in crisis after a devastating terrorist attack kills most of the government, while confronting new threats from enemies abroad.

books.title: Without Remorse
books.summary: John Clark, a former Navy SEAL, seeks revenge after his girlfriend is killed, leading him into a dangerous world of corruption and violence.

books.title: Red Storm Rising
books.summary: A gripping story of a conventional World War III between NATO and the Warsaw Pact countries, exploring the tactical and strategic aspects of modern warfare.

books.title: Debt of Honor
books.summary: Jack Ryan becomes President and faces an escalating conflict with Japan after a devastating attack on the United States, leading to a gripping showdown.

books.title: The Bear and the Dragon
books.summary: Jack Ryan, now President, navigates the complex relationship between the United States, Russia, and China amidst rising tensions and political intrigue.

books.title: War Horse
books.summary: War Horse tells the touching story of a young boy named Albert and his horse Joey, who are separated when Joey is sold to the cavalry during World War I. As they both face the harsh realities of war, their bond and loyalty are put to the test in this gripping tale of courage and friendship.

books.title: Private Peaceful
books.summary: Private Peaceful follows the story of Tommo, a young soldier facing the reality of war as he recalls his childhood and the events that led him to enlist. Set during World War I, this novel explores the themes of love, loyalty, and sacrifice in the face of adversity.

books.title: Kensuke's Kingdom
books.summary: Kensuke's Kingdom is a thrilling adventure about a boy named Michael who becomes stranded on a remote island and discovers he is not alone. With the help of an enigmatic Japanese man named Kensuke, Michael learns valuable lessons about survival, friendship, and the power of resilience.

books.title: The Butterfly Lion
books.summary: The Butterfly Lion follows the story of a young boy named Bertie who befriends a white lion cub named Marlene. Their unbreakable bond transcends time and distance, leading to a heartwarming tale of loyalty, love, and the enduring power of friendship.

books.title: Born to Run
books.summary: Born to Run tells the story of a boy named Patrick who forms a special bond with a wild horse named Cloud. Together, they embark on a journey of self-discovery and resilience, overcoming obstacles and forging a unique connection that changes their lives forever.

books.title: A Medal for Leroy
books.summary: A Medal for Leroy is a poignant tale inspired by true events, following the story of Michael's grandfather who served as a soldier in World War II. Through a journey of discovery and courage, Michael uncovers a family secret that reveals the true meaning of bravery and sacrifice.

books.title: Listen to the Moon
books.summary: Listen to the Moon is a captivating story set during World War I, following the journey of a young girl named Isabel who discovers a mysterious man washed ashore on her remote island. As Isabel nurses the man back to health, she unravels a compelling tale of love, loss, and resilience.

books.title: An Elephant in the Garden
books.summary: An Elephant in the Garden is a powerful story set during World War II, following a young girl named Elizabeth and her family as they shelter an elephant from the Dresden Zoo. Through courage, compassion, and sacrifice, Elizabeth and her family navigate the challenges of war and find hope in unexpected places.

books.title: Running Wild
books.summary: Running Wild is a thrilling adventure following the story of a girl named Will who survives a tsunami in Indonesia and befriends an elephant named Oona. Together, they embark on a dangerous journey through the rainforest, encountering both beauty and danger as they forge an unbreakable bond.

books.title: Shadow
books.summary: Shadow is a heartwarming tale of friendship and loyalty between a boy named Aman and a dog named Shadow. Set against the backdrop of the refugee crisis, Aman and Shadow's bond proves that kindness and compassion can transcend language and cultural barriers, offering hope in the face of adversity.

books.title: Guards! Guards!
books.summary: This comedic fantasy novel follows the misadventures of the Night Watch in the city of Ankh-Morpork. When a secret brotherhood conspires to bring a dragon to the city, it's up to the bumbling members of the Night Watch to save the day. Full of witty humor and clever satire, 'Guards! Guards!' is a delightful read for fantasy fans of all ages.

books.title: Wyrd Sisters
books.summary: In this humorous fantasy novel, three witches find themselves caught up in the political intrigue of the kingdom of Lancre. With a mix of magic, mayhem, and mistaken identities, 'Wyrd Sisters' is a charming tale that pokes fun at classic fantasy tropes while delivering a heartfelt story of friendship and courage.

books.title: Mort
books.summary: Young Mort is unexpectedly hired as Death's apprentice and soon finds himself caught up in a series of misadventures in the realm of the dead. As Mort grapples with the responsibilities of his new role, he must confront questions of life, death, and the nature of existence. 'Mort' is a witty and thought-provoking read that combines humor with philosophical themes.

books.title: Reaper Man
books.summary: When Death is forced to retire, chaos ensues as the natural order of the Discworld is thrown into disarray. In 'Reaper Man', Death takes on a new identity and grapples with the complexities of life, love, and the meaning of existence. This humorous and insightful novel offers a unique perspective on mortality and the human experience.

books.title: Small Gods
books.summary: In the kingdom of Omnia, the all-powerful god Om is facing a crisis of faith as his followers diminish in number. 'Small Gods' is a satirical exploration of organized religion, belief, and the nature of gods. With its clever humor and insightful commentary, this novel challenges readers to question the meaning and impact of faith in society.

books.title: Going Postal
books.summary: In this hilarious fantasy novel, con artist Moist von Lipwig is given a second chance at life when he is tasked with revitalizing the Ankh-Morpork post office. As Moist navigates the eccentric world of postal delivery, he must outwit his enemies and prove himself worthy of redemption. 'Going Postal' is a delightful romp filled with wit, charm, and unexpected twists.

books.title: The Wee Free Men
books.summary: Young witch Tiffany Aching sets out on a daring adventure to rescue her brother from the clutches of the Queen of the Fairies. With the help of the rowdy and boisterous Nac Mac Feegle, Tiffany must confront her fears and tap into her own inner strength. 'The Wee Free Men' is a delightful and empowering coming-of-age tale that celebrates bravery and resourcefulness.

books.title: Making Money
books.summary: In this witty fantasy novel, con artist Moist von Lipwig is once again drawn into a high-stakes scheme, this time involving the Royal Bank of Ankh-Morpork. Facing off against rival factions and navigating the complexities of finance, Moist must use his cunning and charm to outwit his adversaries. 'Making Money' is a clever and entertaining story that blends humor with intrigue.

books.title: Equal Rites
books.summary: When a young girl named Eskarina is chosen to become a wizard, she challenges the traditional gender roles of magic in the Discworld. 'Equal Rites' is a humorous and insightful tale that explores themes of equality, tradition, and the transformative power of magic. With its witty dialogue and charming characters, this novel is a delightful blend of fantasy and satire.

books.title: The Colour of Magic
books.summary: Introducing readers to the fantastical world of the Discworld, 'The Colour of Magic' follows the journey of bumbling wizard Rincewind and his hapless adventures across the realm. Full of quirky characters and absurd situations, this novel is a rollicking introduction to Terry Pratchett's imaginative and humorous universe. 'The Colour of Magic' is a must-read for fans of satire and fantasy.

books.title: Madame Doubtfire
books.summary: Madame Doubtfire is a heartwarming and humorous story about a father who disguises himself as an elderly British nanny in order to spend more time with his children after a messy divorce. The novel explores themes of family, love, and the importance of communication.

books.title: The Tulip Touch
books.summary: The Tulip Touch follows the complex friendship between two girls, Natalie and Tulip. Tulip is a troubled and manipulative character who leads Natalie into a series of increasingly dangerous situations. The novel delves into themes of peer pressure, loyalty, and the consequences of actions.

books.title: The Book of the Banshee
books.summary: The Book of the Banshee is an enchanting fantasy story about a young girl named Aoife who discovers she has the ability to communicate with spirits, including the mysterious Banshee. As Aoife navigates this new world, she learns about friendship, courage, and the power of empathy.

books.title: Up on Cloud Nine
books.summary: Up on Cloud Nine follows the story of 14-year-old Stella who finds herself the center of attention after a freak accident propels her into the sky. The novel explores themes of friendship, self-discovery, and the impact of sudden fame on a teenager's life.

books.title: How to Write Really Badly
books.summary: How to Write Really Badly is a hilarious story about a boy named Tolly who sets out to write the worst story ever. Through Tolly's misadventures and comical mistakes, readers are entertained while learning valuable lessons about the writing process and creativity.

books.title: The Jamie and Angus Stories
books.summary: The Jamie and Angus Stories is a delightful collection of short tales about a young boy named Jamie and his toy Highland bull, Angus. These charming stories explore themes of imagination, friendship, and the bond between a child and their favorite toy.

books.title: Raking the Ashes
books.summary: Raking the Ashes follows the story of a teenage girl named Robin who becomes entangled in a mystery surrounding her estranged father's past. As Robin unravels the secrets hidden within her family history, she must confront difficult truths about love, loss, and forgiveness.

books.title: Diary of a Killer Cat
books.summary: Diary of a Killer Cat is a witty and entertaining story narrated by an arrogant and mischievous cat named Tuffy. Through Tuffy's humorous perspective, readers are treated to a tale of feline antics, misunderstandings, and unexpected friendships.

books.title: The Granny Project
books.summary: The Granny Project tells the story of a teenage girl named Kelly who embarks on a project to find a perfect grandmother for a school assignment. Through her search, Kelly learns valuable lessons about family, acceptance, and the bonds that connect generations.

books.title: The Devil Walks
books.summary: The Devil Walks is a gripping historical novel set during the early 19th century, following the story of a young girl named Lizzie who becomes convinced that her brother is possessed by the devil. The novel delves into themes of superstition, fear, and the power of belief.

books.title: The Neverending Story
books.summary: The Neverending Story follows the adventures of a young boy named Bastian who discovers a magical book that transports him to the fantasy world of Fantasia. As he reads the book, he becomes a part of the story and must help save Fantasia from an evil force known as The Nothing. Along the way, Bastian encounters a colorful cast of characters and learns valuable lessons about bravery, friendship, and the power of imagination.

books.title: Momo
books.summary: Momo tells the story of a young orphan girl who has the ability to listen to people and understand what truly matters in life. When mysterious gray men arrive in the town and encourage people to save time by depositing it in the Time-Saving Bank, Momo must use her unique gifts to save her friends and the town from losing their precious moments.

books.title: Jim Button and Luke the Engine Driver
books.summary: Jim Button and Luke the Engine Driver is a delightful tale of friendship and adventure. Jim Button, a young boy living on the tiny island of Morrowland, embarks on a journey with his friend Luke the Engine Driver to rescue Princess Li Si from the clutches of the dragon Mrs. Grindtooth. Along the way, they encounter magical creatures and face exciting challenges that test their courage and wit.

books.title: Invisible Ink
books.summary: Invisible Ink is a gripping mystery novel that follows the story of Lukas, a young boy who discovers a hidden world of secrets and intrigue. When Lukas receives a mysterious bottle of invisible ink, he must unravel the clues it contains to uncover a long-forgotten family mystery and prevent a great injustice from being committed.

books.title: The Mirror in the Mirror
books.summary: The Mirror in the Mirror is a collection of mesmerizing short stories that blur the lines between reality and fantasy. From magical mirrors that reveal hidden truths to parallel worlds filled with surreal encounters, each story offers a glimpse into a world where the ordinary becomes extraordinary and the impossible feels within reach.

books.title: The Night of Wishes
books.summary: The Night of Wishes is a charming fairy tale about a little girl named Anthea who stumbles upon a magical patch of lavender that grants wishes on the night of the shooting stars. As Anthea and her friends make wishes that come true in unexpected ways, they learn valuable lessons about kindness, friendship, and the power of hope.

books.title: The Satanic Mill
books.summary: The Satanic Mill is a thrilling historical mystery set in 19th century England. The story follows the adventures of two orphans, Krabat and Aniel, who are sent to work at a sinister mill run by the mysterious Miller. As they uncover the mill's dark secrets, Krabat and Aniel must use their courage and wit to escape its clutches and bring justice to those who have suffered.

books.title: Ophelia's Shadow Theatre
books.summary: Ophelia's Shadow Theatre is a captivating tale of a young girl named Ophelia who discovers a magical shadow theatre that can bring her dreams and stories to life. As Ophelia explores the wonders of the shadow theatre and creates her own fantastical performances, she learns valuable lessons about creativity, self-expression, and the power of storytelling.

books.title: The Surprising Adventures of the Talking Pickle
books.summary: The Surprising Adventures of the Talking Pickle is a hilarious and whimsical tale about a talking pickle named Mr. Bungle who embarks on a series of zany adventures with his human friends. From daring escapades to silly mishaps, Mr. Bungle's antics entertain and delight readers of all ages as they follow his surprising journey through the colorful world of the Pickling Provinces.

books.title: The Angel's Tree
books.summary: The Angel's Tree is a heartwarming story about a young boy named Peter who discovers a magical tree in the forest that grows beautiful glass apples. As Peter learns about the tree's mysterious origins and its power to bring joy and healing to those in need, he embarks on a quest to share its gifts with his community and spread the message of love and compassion.

books.title: Half Magic
books.summary: Four siblings find a magical coin that grants wishes, but only grants half of what they wish for. As they navigate the consequences of their wishes, they discover the true power of cooperation and family.

books.title: Knight's Castle
books.summary: When Roger and Ann and their cousins accidentally stumble upon a magical toy castle, they find themselves transported back in time to the medieval world of knights and chivalry. They must navigate challenges and learn important lessons about bravery and honor.

books.title: The Well-Wishers
books.summary: As the children of the neighborhood work together to clean up an old well, they discover that their good deeds are rewarded with magical wishes. But they soon learn that their wishes can have unintended consequences, teaching them the value of selflessness and friendship.

books.title: Magic by the Lake
books.summary: When the siblings spend their summer vacation by a lake, they encounter a mysterious lake that grants magical wishes only during a certain time of day. Their adventures with the magical lake lead them to unexpected discoveries about themselves and the power of friendship.

books.title: Seven-Day Magic
books.summary: A group of children discover a magical book that allows them to travel into different stories for a week at a time. As they experience various adventures and challenges, they learn valuable lessons about courage, empathy, and the power of storytelling.

books.title: The Time Garden
books.summary: Four siblings discover a hidden door in their new house that leads to a magical garden where time behaves differently. As they explore the garden's wonders and mysteries, they learn important lessons about patience, resilience, and the beauty of nature.

books.title: Magic or Not?
books.summary: A group of children in a small town encounter a mysterious library that may or may not be magical. As they investigate the library's secrets and test its supposed powers, they embark on a journey of discovery and friendship.

books.title: The Well-Wishers
books.summary: Five siblings find a special well behind their vacation house that grants them magical wishes. But as they make their wishes, they learn that true happiness comes from helping others and working together as a team.

books.title: Magic in the Mirror
books.summary: Two siblings discover a magic mirror that transports them to a parallel world where they meet doppelgangers of themselves. As they navigate the challenges of this mirror world, they learn valuable lessons about identity, friendship, and acceptance.

books.title: The Well-Wishers
books.summary: Three siblings stumble upon a mysterious well that grants them a wish a day. As they test the well's powers and learn to make responsible wishes, they realize the importance of gratitude, kindness, and generosity.

books.title: Holes
books.summary: Holes is a compelling story about Stanley Yelnats, a boy sent to a juvenile detention camp where the boys are forced to dig holes every day. As Stanley tries to survive the harsh conditions and solve the mystery of the cursed Yelnats family, he uncovers unexpected secrets and forms unlikely friendships.

books.title: Wayside School series
books.summary: The Wayside School series follows the wacky adventures of students and teachers at Wayside School, a thirty-story school with one classroom on each floor. Filled with humor and absurd situations, each book in the series brings laughter and life lessons to young readers.

books.title: Sideways Stories from Wayside School
books.summary: In this collection of whimsical short stories, Louis Sachar introduces readers to the eccentric students and teachers of Wayside School. From Mrs. Gorf turning students into apples to Todd battling a mysterious stranger, each tale is filled with humor and imagination.

books.title: Small Steps
books.summary: Small Steps continues the journey of Armpit, a character from Holes, as he tries to rebuild his life after leaving Camp Green Lake. Facing challenges and unexpected opportunities, Armpit learns valuable lessons about redemption, friendship, and second chances.

books.title: Fuzzy Mud
books.summary: Fuzzy Mud follows the story of Tamaya and Marshall, two students who stumble upon a dangerous biological experiment gone wrong in a forbidden area near their school. As they navigate the mysterious mud and its consequences, they must find a way to save themselves and their community.

books.title: The Cardturner
books.summary: The Cardturner is a captivating novel that explores the world of bridge, a card game that becomes a bridge between generations for the protagonist Alton and his uncle Lester. Through the game, Alton discovers valuable lessons about family, friendship, and life.

books.title: Someday Angeline
books.summary: Someday Angeline tells the story of Angeline, a young girl with exceptional abilities and a unique perspective on the world. As Angeline navigates the challenges of school and friendships, readers are inspired by her creativity, resilience, and determination.

books.title: Dogs Don't Tell Jokes
books.summary: Dogs Don't Tell Jokes follows the humorous misadventures of Gary, a boy with a passion for making people laugh through his jokes. As Gary pursues his dream of becoming a stand-up comedian, he learns valuable lessons about comedy, identity, and self-acceptance.

books.title: There's a Boy in the Girls' Bathroom
books.summary: There's a Boy in the Girls' Bathroom is a heartwarming and humorous story about Bradley, a troubled boy struggling with school, friendships, and self-esteem. Through the help of his school counselor, Bradley embarks on a journey of self-discovery and growth.

books.title: The Marvin Redpost series
books.summary: The Marvin Redpost series follows the adventures of Marvin, a boy who encounters mysterious and puzzling situations in his everyday life. With clever twists and engaging storytelling, each book in the series invites young readers to join Marvin on his entertaining escapades.

books.title: Magic Tree House: Dinosaurs Before Dark
books.summary: In this first installment of the Magic Tree House series, siblings Jack and Annie discover a magical tree house filled with books that can transport them through time. They are taken on an adventure back to the time of dinosaurs where they encounter various species and must find a way back home safely.

books.title: Magic Tree House: Pirates Past Noon
books.summary: Jack and Annie travel back in time to the age of pirates and must help a lost pirate find his way back to his boat. Along the way, they encounter dangers and challenges that test their problem-solving skills and courage.

books.title: Magic Tree House: Midnight on the Moon
books.summary: Jack and Annie journey to the moon where they explore the lunar surface and discover secrets about space travel. They must solve puzzles and work together to find a way back to Earth before their time runs out.

books.title: Magic Tree House: Dolphins at Daybreak
books.summary: Jack and Annie set off on an underwater adventure to help a group of dolphins in trouble. They learn about marine life and the importance of protecting the environment while trying to complete their mission.

books.title: Magic Tree House: A Ghost Tale for Christmas Time
books.summary: Jack and Annie travel to Victorian England where they meet Charles Dickens and help him write a Christmas ghost story. Along the way, they encounter supernatural elements and learn the true meaning of Christmas spirit.

books.title: Magic Tree House: Lions at Lunchtime
books.summary: Jack and Annie go on a safari adventure in Africa where they encounter lions and other wild animals. They learn about the importance of wildlife conservation and must navigate the dangers of the savanna to complete their mission.

books.title: Magic Tree House: Viking Ships at Sunrise
books.summary: Jack and Annie travel back to the time of Vikings and must find a way to help a Viking village under attack. They learn about Norse mythology and culture while trying to outsmart their enemies and save the day.

books.title: Magic Tree House: Thanksgiving on Thursday
books.summary: Jack and Annie travel to the time of the Pilgrims and experience the first Thanksgiving feast. They learn about history and gratitude while solving a mystery and helping a lost friend find their way back home.

books.title: Magic Tree House: Earthquake in the Early Morning
books.summary: Jack and Annie journey to San Francisco during the 1906 earthquake and must help rescue a trapped family. They face the challenges of a natural disaster and work together to save lives and find a way back to their own time.

books.title: Magic Tree House: Revolutionary War on Wednesday
books.summary: Jack and Annie find themselves in the midst of the American Revolutionary War and must help General George Washington. They witness historical events and discover the importance of freedom and bravery in the fight for independence.

books.title: Because of Winn-Dixie
books.summary: Because of Winn-Dixie tells the story of a young girl named Opal who adopts a stray dog she finds at a grocery store. Together, Opal and Winn-Dixie make new friends and discover the true meaning of friendship and family.

books.title: The Tale of Despereaux
books.summary: The Tale of Despereaux follows the adventures of a brave mouse named Despereaux who sets out to rescue a princess. Along the way, he encounters danger, love, and unexpected friendship in the magical world of the castle.

books.title: Flora & Ulysses: The Illuminated Adventures
books.summary: Flora & Ulysses is a heartwarming tale about a girl named Flora who befriends a squirrel with superhero powers. Together, they embark on thrilling adventures and learn valuable lessons about courage and acceptance.

books.title: The Miraculous Journey of Edward Tulane
books.summary: The Miraculous Journey of Edward Tulane follows the extraordinary adventures of a porcelain rabbit named Edward who learns the true meaning of love and loss as he travels across different lives and experiences.

books.title: Edward's Eyes
books.summary: Edward's Eyes is a poignant story set in 1941 that explores themes of family, courage, and resilience through the eyes of a boy named Edward who dreams of becoming a professional baseball player.

books.title: Mercy Watson to the Rescue
books.summary: Mercy Watson to the Rescue is a hilarious tale about a toast-loving pig named Mercy who gets into all sorts of misadventures in her quest for snacks. With quirky characters and delightful humor, this book is sure to entertain young readers.

books.title: Louise, The Adventures of a Chicken
books.summary: Louise, The Adventures of a Chicken follows the fearless exploits of a chicken named Louise who embarks on a journey to see the world. Along the way, she encounters pirates, polar bears, and other unexpected challenges.

books.title: Bink and Gollie
books.summary: Bink and Gollie is a delightful collection of short stories about two best friends with quirky personalities. Through humorous adventures and heartwarming moments, Bink and Gollie celebrate the joy of friendship and individuality.

books.title: La La La: A Story of Hope
books.summary: La La La: A Story of Hope is a beautifully illustrated picture book that follows the journey of a young girl searching for connection and friendship. With minimal text and expressive artwork, this book conveys a powerful message of resilience and hope.

books.title: Raymie Nightingale
books.summary: Raymie Nightingale is a touching story about friendship and perseverance set in the 1970s. Follow Raymie Clarke as she competes in the Little Miss Central Florida Tire competition and discovers the true meaning of courage and community.

books.title: Hatchet
books.summary: In 'Hatchet', 13-year-old Brian Robeson survives a plane crash in the Canadian wilderness and must learn to fend for himself using only a hatchet. As he struggles to survive, Brian faces various challenges and encounters with wild animals, testing his courage and resourcefulness.

books.title: The River
books.summary: In 'The River', Brian Robeson is asked to return to the Canadian wilderness with a government psychologist to retrace his steps and learn survival techniques. When their small plane crashes, Brian is once again faced with the challenge of survival in the harsh wilderness.

books.title: Brian's Winter
books.summary: 'Brian's Winter' explores an alternate ending to 'Hatchet', imagining what would have happened if Brian had not been rescued and had to survive the harsh Canadian winter alone. Brian must use all his survival skills to withstand the brutal cold and find ways to stay alive.

books.title: Dogsong
books.summary: 'Dogsong' follows the journey of 14-year-old Russel Susskit, a boy from a remote Inuit village in Alaska who sets out on a quest to discover his own spirit and purpose. Along the way, Russel forms a bond with a pack of sled dogs and learns the ways of his ancestors.

books.title: The Winter Room
books.summary: 'The Winter Room' is a beautifully crafted story set in rural Wisconsin, focusing on the lives of two young boys and their deep connection to the natural world and the changing seasons. Through storytelling and family bonds, the boys navigate the joys and challenges of growing up.

books.title: Woodsong
books.summary: 'Woodsong' is a memoir by Gary Paulsen that recounts his experiences as a dogsled racer in Alaska. Through vivid and heartfelt storytelling, Paulsen shares the excitement, danger, and profound connections he forged with his team of sled dogs while exploring the remote wilderness.

books.title: Tracker
books.summary: 'Tracker' follows the story of John Borne, a young Ojibwa boy with a special gift for tracking animals in the woods. When John's village is threatened by a pack of wolves, he must use his tracking skills to protect his community and confront the challenges of the wild.

books.title: Nightjohn
books.summary: 'Nightjohn' tells the story of Sarny, a young slave girl on a Southern plantation who encounters Nightjohn, a literate runaway slave who teaches her how to read and write. Through their forbidden lessons, Sarny discovers the power of education and the courage to fight for freedom.

books.title: Canoeing with the Cree
books.summary: 'Canoeing with the Cree' is a true story of Gary Paulsen's daring adventure as a teenager embarking on a 2250-mile canoe trip with a friend from Minnesota to the Hudson Bay. Through harrowing challenges and unexpected encounters, Paulsen learns the true meaning of survival and friendship.

books.title: Lawn Boy
books.summary: 'Lawn Boy' is a humorous tale about a 12-year-old boy who starts a summer lawn-mowing business and quickly becomes a successful entrepreneur. As he navigates the ups and downs of his booming business, the boy learns valuable lessons about money, friendship, and the importance of hard work.

books.title: Eats, Shoots & Leaves
books.summary: This well-known book explores the importance of punctuation in the English language, using humor and wit to make a case for the correct usage of commas, apostrophes, and more.

books.title: Cat Out of Hell
books.summary: A quirky and darkly funny novel that follows the adventures of a talking cat named Roger who may or may not be linked to a series of mysterious deaths.

books.title: Talk to the Hand: The Utter Bloody Rudeness of the World Today, or Six Good Reasons to Stay Home and Bolt the Door
books.summary: Truss humorously examines the decline of polite behavior in society and offers insight into why people should embrace more courtesy and consideration in their daily interactions.

books.title: With One Lousy Free Packet of Seed
books.summary: A comedic novel that follows protagonist Osborne Lonsdale in his hilarious misadventures after receiving an unsolicited packet of seeds and deciding to grow a garden.

books.title: Tennyson's Gift
books.summary: A historical novel set in the Victorian era, where a young woman named Emily takes a job as a governess and discovers mysterious connections to the poet Alfred Lord Tennyson.

books.title: The Lunar Cats
books.summary: An imaginative story about a group of cats who embark on a space adventure to the moon, facing challenges and forming unlikely friendships along the way.

books.title: A Certain Age
books.summary: Set in the 1920s, this novel follows the lives of glamorous socialites navigating love, scandal, and betrayal in the midst of the Roaring Twenties.

books.title: Going Loco
books.summary: A comedic travel memoir recounting Truss's experiences traveling through various Latin American countries, filled with humorous observations and cultural insights.

books.title: The Woman Who Lost Her Tumblegum and Other Quick Plays
books.summary: A collection of short plays that showcase Truss's wit and humor, exploring a range of quirky characters in amusing and thought-provoking scenarios.

books.title: A Shot in the Dark
books.summary: A suspenseful novel following Inspector Steine as he investigates a murder in 1950s Brighton, filled with twists, turns, and dark humor.

books.title: Olivia
books.summary: Olivia is a spunky pig who has a big imagination and a strong personality. Follow her on various adventures as she navigates daily life with her family and friends, always bringing her unique flair and humor to every situation.

books.title: Olivia Saves the Circus
books.summary: When the circus cancels its performance in Olivia's town, she takes it upon herself to save the day by putting on her own extraordinary show. Join Olivia and her friends as they showcase their talents and creativity in a thrilling circus extravaganza.

books.title: Olivia Forms a Band
books.summary: Inspired by her love for music, Olivia decides to start a band with her friends. From choosing instruments to practicing their songs, follow Olivia's musical journey as she learns about collaboration, creativity, and the joy of making music together.

books.title: Olivia Helps with Christmas
books.summary: As Christmas approaches, Olivia finds herself caught up in the excitement of holiday preparations. Join her as she decorates the tree, bakes cookies, and spreads cheer to her family and neighbors in this heartwarming tale of generosity and joy.

books.title: Olivia Goes to Venice
books.summary: When Olivia's family travels to Venice, Italy, she is eager to explore the city's canals and bridges. Follow Olivia's adventures as she immerses herself in the rich culture and history of Venice, making new friends and unforgettable memories along the way.

books.title: Olivia and the Fairy Princesses
books.summary: Feeling tired of conforming to traditional princess stereotypes, Olivia sets out on a quest to discover her own unique identity. Join her as she meets different fairy princesses and learns that being true to oneself is the most important magic of all.

books.title: Olivia the Spy
books.summary: When mysterious things start happening in Olivia's neighborhood, she puts on her detective hat and becomes a spy to solve the case. Follow Olivia's clever investigations and thrilling escapades as she uncovers the truth behind the puzzling events.

books.title: Olivia Bean, Trivia Queen
books.summary: Olivia loves trivia and dreams of competing on a game show. With the support of her friends and family, Olivia enters a trivia contest that tests her knowledge, wit, and courage. Join Olivia on her quest to become the trivia queen and prove that she is more than just a book-smart girl.

books.title: Olivia and the Missing Toy
books.summary: When Olivia's favorite toy goes missing, she embarks on a search mission to find it. Follow Olivia's determined efforts and all the twists and turns she encounters as she tracks down her beloved toy, showcasing the power of perseverance and resourcefulness.

books.title: Olivia the Magnificent
books.summary: In this magical adventure, Olivia discovers she has a talent for magic tricks and decides to perform in a talent show. Join Olivia as she practices her illusions, overcomes stage fright, and wows the audience with her enchanting performance, proving that belief in oneself is the greatest magic of all.

books.title: Twilight
books.summary: Twilight follows the love story between a young human girl, Bella Swan, and a mysterious vampire, Edward Cullen. As they navigate the challenges of their relationship, they must also deal with the dangers and conflicts that come with being part of the supernatural world.

books.title: New Moon
books.summary: In New Moon, Bella is devastated when Edward leaves her, leading her to turn to her friend, Jacob Black. However, she soon discovers a dangerous secret about Jacob that threatens to change her life forever.

books.title: Eclipse
books.summary: Eclipse continues Bella's journey as she must choose between her love for Edward and her growing feelings for Jacob. Meanwhile, a new threat emerges in the form of an army of vampires that puts everyone she cares about in danger.

books.title: Breaking Dawn
books.summary: Breaking Dawn concludes the Twilight series with Bella and Edward facing their biggest challenge yet as they welcome a new member into their family. As they navigate the complexities of their new life, old enemies resurface, putting their happiness at risk.

books.title: The Host
books.summary: The Host explores a post-apocalyptic world where alien parasites have taken over human bodies. When Wanderer, a peaceful alien soul, is inserted into the body of a rebellious human named Melanie, they must learn to coexist and navigate the complexities of their shared existence.

books.title: Midnight Sun
books.summary: Midnight Sun offers a retelling of Twilight from Edward's perspective, delving into his inner thoughts and emotions as he falls in love with Bella. Readers gain new insights into Edward's character and motivations through this unique perspective.

books.title: Life and Death: Twilight Reimagined
books.summary: Life and Death: Twilight Reimagined is a gender-swapped version of Twilight, where Bella is a human boy named Beau and Edward is a female vampire named Edythe. This reimagination offers a fresh take on the original story while still capturing the essence of the original characters and themes.

books.title: The Chemist
books.summary: The Chemist follows the story of an ex-government agent known as The Chemist who is on the run from her former employers. When she is given a life-changing assignment that forces her to confront her past, she must use all her skills to survive and protect those she cares about.

books.title: The Short Second Life of Bree Tanner
books.summary: The Short Second Life of Bree Tanner is a novella that explores the story of Bree Tanner, a newly turned vampire introduced in Eclipse. As Bree tries to navigate her new existence as a vampire, she uncovers dark secrets about the world of vampires and the danger that surrounds her.

books.title: Prom Nights from Hell
books.summary: Prom Nights from Hell is a collection of short stories by various authors, including Stephenie Meyer. Each story centers around a supernatural twist on the traditional prom night, offering a mix of romance, fantasy, and suspense that will appeal to young adult readers.

books.title: The Witch of Blackbird Pond
books.summary: Set in 1687, this novel follows the story of a young girl named Kit Tyler who moves from Barbados to the Puritan community of Wethersfield, Connecticut. Accused of witchcraft due to her unconventional ways, Kit must navigate the strict society as she befriends an outcast named Hannah Tupper.

books.title: The Bronze Bow
books.summary: Set in ancient Jerusalem, this novel tells the story of a young boy named Daniel who joins a group of rebels fighting against the Roman rule. Amidst his quest for revenge, Daniel learns the power of forgiveness and redemption.

books.title: Calico Captive
books.summary: In this novel set during the French and Indian War, a young woman named Miriam Willard is taken captive by Native Americans. As she adjusts to life in a different culture, Miriam forms unexpected bonds and learns the importance of empathy and understanding.

books.title: The Sign of the Beaver
books.summary: Set in colonial Maine, this novel follows the story of a young boy named Matt who is left alone to guard his family's cabin. When a Native American boy named Attean befriends him, Matt learns survival skills and gains a new perspective on friendship and respect.

books.title: The Light on Hog Island
books.summary: In this novel, young Phoebe must navigate the challenges of living on an island off the coast of Maine during the early 20th century. With her grandfather's failing health and the threat of a stranger on the island, Phoebe must find courage and strength within herself.

books.title: The Giver
books.summary: In a society where emotions and memories are suppressed, a young boy named Jonas is chosen to be the Receiver of Memory. Through his training with the Giver, Jonas discovers the truth about his community and must make a life-changing decision.

books.title: The Reluctant Dragon
books.summary: This classic story follows a young boy named Grahame who befriends a peaceful dragon living near his village. Despite the initial fear and misunderstanding, Grahame and the dragon form a bond that challenges the village's beliefs about bravery and friendship.

books.title: In the Year of the Boar and Jackie Robinson
books.summary: Set in 1947, this novel follows a young Chinese immigrant girl named Shirley Temple Wong who moves to Brooklyn, New York. As she adjusts to American culture and falls in love with baseball, Shirley finds inspiration in Jackie Robinson's barrier-breaking achievements.

books.title: Troubling a Star
books.summary: In this novel, young Ellie heads to Antarctica as a volunteer to assist a family friend with research. Amidst the stunning landscapes and unfamiliar dangers, Ellie uncovers mysteries and secrets that challenge her perception of truth and trust.

books.title: The Last Dogs
